loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 52 years old; she's still single and currently residing in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. In order to financially support her daily needs, she engaged in selling foods in the street. In order to resell those delicious foods and earn more profit, she is asking for financial assistance to buy more foods to sell. Recently, she borrowed loan from GDMPC for the purpose of buying those productive foods to resell to her customers.

Lucia's plan for herself is to save more money.

loans.use: to buy more food to sell

loans.name: Porposa

texts.en: Porposa is a separated woman with 4 children. She is 56 years old and resides in Dao, Pagadian City, Philippines. Porposa owns and operates a retail store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living. She's been 10 years in this business. Each month, she earns PHP 15,000 doing this type of business. Porposa requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase liquor, sardines, etc. to sell. Recently, Porposa joined GDMPC. In the future, she wants to build a house and to help her children finish school.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: William

texts.en: William manages a vulcanizing and repair shop in his village. He has managed his business for over 10 years now. He extends his services very well to gain good profits. He needs to improve his services to satisfy needs of his customers. William is asking for a loan of P10,000 to buy motorcycle parts and tools use in his repair and vulcanizing shop. William hopes to gain good profits by extending good products and services as well.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts and tools use in his repair shop.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.en:
Luis is 54 years old and lives in the municipality of Caceres. This year, looking to improve his quality of life and his family’s, he started his own business. Luis raises cattle and has one relative who works for him. He inherited this business from his family and does it because it is something that he loves to do.

The economy has been an issue for this man, which is why he is looking for a way he can do well. Luis is aware that if he wants to obtain good results from his business he has to invest in it and work hard. So, in order to increase his clients and sales, he is asking for a loan to buy four male steers to raise.

Luis expects that someday he will leave his business to his children, but only when it is successful. He is asking for a little help and you can be the answer he’s looking for. Loan now and watch how he starts growing his business and his life.

loans.use: to buy four male steers to raise.

loans.name: Libardo Jose

texts.en:
Libardo is 34 years old and lives in the municipality of San Pelayo. He has two daughters who are eight and five years of age and whom he loves very much. For him, they are the best present that life has given to him. For that same reason he wants to give them the best life he can, so he’s going to start a food selling business.

A while ago, a friend taught him everything about the food business, so now he’s going to use his knowledge to manage his own business and make it successful. He expects to obtain good profits from it so he can provide for his family. He’s asking for a loan so he can buy some pots, milk and tripe (a traditional food in Colombia) to sell to his customers.

Libardo’s house has some problems right now that he needs to solve soon, which is the reason why he expects that the profits from his business will let him do that. You can help Libardo to accomplish that and a lot more with just giving him the loan he needs.

loans.use: to buy some pots, milk and tripe (a traditional food in Colombia) to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Jose Candelario

texts.es:
Candelario, de 47 años de edad, no pudo estudiar por motivos de escasos recursos económicos, actualmente está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y en su hogar únicamente vive él, su esposa y sus dos hijas.

Candelario, es un agricultor, este trabajo lo aprendió desde pequeño, porque su padre le enseño, porque él tiene 30 años de laborar como agricultor.- Candelario, también trabaja como albañil y actualmente se encuentra trabajando a 2 kilómetros de su casa. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos, específicamente comprará abono, pesticidas y herbicidas.

El sueña con tener una buena producción de granos básicos.
texts.en:
Candelario is 47 years old. He was not able to study due to his limited economic resources. He is currently in a long-term relationship, and his partner takes care of the household chores. Just he, his wife, and his two daughters live in their home.

Candelario is a farmer, a livelihood that he learned since he was a child thanks to being taught by his father, who has been working as a farmer for 30 years. Candelario also works as a construction worker, and is currently working two kilometers from his house.

He needs the loan in order to purchase agricultural supplies for his crops. Specifically, he will buy fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides. His dream is to have good production of basic grains.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for his crops, specifically fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides.

loans.name: Joana

texts.en:
Joana is a 38 year old woman and married with two children. She lives in a rural community outside of Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She raises pigs and sells it to the restaurant or at the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years.

Joana needs a loan to buy piglets and pig feeds to assist her in running the business. She plans to use her profits to improve her home and also help cover the family's weekly expenses.

She has been a SPBD member since 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pig feeds for her piggery business.

loans.name: Sreysros

texts.en: Sreysros is 19 years old and a university student who resides in Phnom Penh city. She has received a good chance to go to an internship abroad for nine months, and for those months she will get an amount of money which is enough for her to support her living and be able to save about 8 USD per day. Having not enough working capital to prepare some important documents to travel abroad is the main challenge for her. Because of this reason, she is now applying for a Kiva loan via VisionFund to pay for preparing her passport and visa to support her internship. She hopes that she will improve her skills and gain more experience through this internship.

loans.use: to pay for preparing her passport and visa to support her internship to improve her skills and gain more experience.

loans.name: Iris Yessenia

texts.es: Iris tiene 25 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos pequeños hijos de 9 años y 10 meses de edad a su hijo mayor le está dando estudios porque quieren verlo triunfar en la vida, ella es una joven que siempre demuestra su espíritu de superación y muy trabajadora se gana la vida dignamente ya que su compañero de vida le ayuda para el sustento del hogar. Iris se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos en su comunidad es así como ella obtiene sus ingresos económicos. Iris desea comprar materiales para la construcción de una galera en su vivienda ya que como lo demuestra la fotografía si la necesita ya que cuando llueve se moja, por ello no puede ejercer sus actividades, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: laminas, cuartones, clavos y alambre para construir una galera en la zona del lavadero.
texts.en:
Iris is 25 years old and lives in her family home with her life partner and their two young children, a nine-year-old and a ten-month-old. They are sending their older son to school because they want to see him succeed in life.

Iris is a young woman who has always shown a strong drive towards improving herself. She is a hard worker and, alongside her partner, makes a decent living because they both help each other to support their household. She works selling dairy products throughout her community. This is her means of making her own income.

She wants to buy materials in order to build a shed outside her home, because as you can see in the picture, everything gets wet when it rains and she can't work. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in planks, beams, nails, and wire. She will use them to build a shed near the laundry area.

loans.use: to invest in planks, beams, nails, and wire to build a shed near her laundry area.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase sugar, coffee, cooking oil, and kitchen equipment.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en: Julita is 62 years old. She's married but her husband has already passed away. Over the past fourteen years, Julita was able to put up a retail store that absolutely met the market's demands in their village. The business is still doing well and is giving better cash to support and provide her needs. Julita joined GDMPC  to have an easy access to financial services. She borrowed a new loan from GDMPC to buy more grocery goods to sell. Julita expects an increase in sales to expand her business and improve her general living conditions as well as the living situation of her family.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice has been running her transportation services for many years and earns money from it. She was able to pay her previous loan used for her business. She wants to earn more profit in order to provide for the needs of her children in sending them in school. Recently, she took a new loan to buy new tires for her motorcycle.

She is hoping that someday, with her generated income, she will be able to buy a sidecar for her motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy new tires

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of rice and vegetables to be sold.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is 39 years old and married, with four children. She lives in a rural, community outskirt of Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

To earn a living, Caroline raises pigs and sells them in her community or to a restaurant. She has been doing this for two years.

Now, Caroline is applying for a loan to buy piglets, pig feed, and also material, such as sago palm leaves, a timer, and cement to repair her piggery shed. She hopes to expand her business with the profit she makes. The little income she has helps her to cover her family's daily expenses.

Caroline joined South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy piglets, pig feed, and also material, such as sago palm leaves, a timer, and cement, to repair her piggery shed.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
A famous philosopher once quoted, “What the caterpillar calls the end, the rest of the world calls a butterfly.”

It’s just a great parallelism of how Zenaida views life. Twenty years in the tailoring business, she encountered many ups and downs, and many times she did think of giving up; yet she never gets tired of the business she started.

It was in the year 2005 that Zenaida became part of CCT. This is also one of the reasons that she considers why she strives to push forward. With the help of CCT, together with Kiva, she was able to acquire loans that really helped her improve her business.

This time, Zenaida needs more supplies of tailoring materials like needles, fabrics, and thread, but she doesn’t have enough resources to buy them. She also wants to have another sewing machine, but she doesn't have enough funds. So, she wants to request help from you. She wants to acquire a PHP 25,000 loan to purchase the said materials for her inventory.

She believes this will help her enough to increase her sales for her family's needs. Every week, she meets with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more clothing products, a sewing machine, and tailoring supplies needed for her business.

loans.name: Edgardo José

texts.es: Edgardo es un microempresario que trabajó en un periódico local de la ciudad de Cartagena, oficio que lo inspiró a crear su propia microempresa una litografía, en la cual estableció las mejores prácticas que había aprendido de su anterior empleo con la finalidad de ser exitoso en este proyecto de negocio. Hoy en día ofrece multiplex servicio entre ellos de publicidad impresa;  volantes, plegables, afiches, calendarios, brochure, pendones, adhesivos, también papelería comercial; hojas membrete, facturas, recibos, tarjetas de presentación, sobres, carpetas, entre otras publicaciones; revistas, libros, diplomas, periódicos y demás. Cuenta con una experiencia de cuatro años y labora de lunes a sábado en el horario de 8 a.m. hasta las 5 p.m., sus clientes en su gran mayoría son empresas de la ciudad a quienes les incluye el servicio de diseño y les ofrece paquetes de acuerdo a sus necesidades. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en insumos de papelería y tintas, para la impresión de sus trabajos, así cumplirá con mayores volúmenes de pedidos.  Su meta a futuro es aumenta la producción, los ingresos y las utilidades.
texts.en:
Edgardo is a micro-entrepreneur. He previously worked for a local newspaper in the city of Cartagena, which inspired him to create his own microbusiness in lithography. He uses the best practices that he learned at his previous job with the goal of having a successful business. He now offers many services, including printing services related to publicity (flyers, brochures, posters, calendars, banners, stickers), commercial stationery (letterheads, invoices, receipts, business cards, envelopes, folders), and other publications (magazines, books, diplomas, newspapers, etc.). He has four years of experience and he works from Monday to Saturday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Most of his clients are businesses in the city; he offers them design services and packages tailored to their needs.

He is currently applying for a Kiva loan. It is his first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy stationery supplies and ink for his printing services; in this way, he can fill a greater volume of orders. His goal for the future is to increase his production, earnings, and profits.

loans.use: to buy stationery supplies and ink

loans.name: Norma Maribel

texts.es: Norma de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 9 años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada, con lo que obtienen de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, maíz y demás ingredientes y asi poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Norma, age 32, lives in her own house with her three children. She has been making and selling 'pupusas' [stuffed tortillas] for nine years. Her business is close to her home in an area that is highly traveled.

With what she gets from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy pork rinds, soft cheese, beans, corn, and other ingredients. This way she will be able to continue with her work, which generates good earnings for her.

loans.use: to buy pork rinds, soft cheese, beans, corn, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Dúo Dios Bendito Group

texts.es:
Dúo Dios Bendito
Este dúo está conformado por Gloria de 21 añod de edad, ella es originaria de Sumpango Sac,es soltera, y tiene su propio negocio Gloria tiene un molino de nixtamal, además se dedica a tejer fajas típicas, es el segundo crédito que está solicitando ya que necesita comprar discos del motor para moler maíz, pues se le arruinaron y  ella no duda de que kiva le brindara la ayuda que ella necesita, ya que gracias a Dios ha podido sobresalir en las metas que se trazado.
texts.en:
Dúo Dios Bendito

This duo is comprised of Gloria, age 21, who is from Sumpango Sac. She is single, and she has her own business. Gloria has a corn mill, in addition to weaving typical belts.

It is the second loan that she is requesting. She needs to buy motor disks, because they were ruined, in order to grind corn.

She does not doubt that Kiva will provide the help that she needs. Thank God she has been able to excel in the goals that she has laid out.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for the corn mill in order to make dough.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Day by day increasing expenditures, with no ability to meet them, compelled Kalsoom to initiate her own business selling animals.

Kalsoom is a 26-year-old married woman who has been buying and selling animals, with the help of her husband, for many years. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She works very hard to provide her family with the basic necessities of life. 

Kalsoom has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. She intends to utilize this loan to purchase more baby goats and calves and cater to more customers. She is confident that she can further expand her business with the help of future loans

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves and cater to more customers.

loans.name: Sughra

texts.en: Sughra was living a tough life some years ago; it was very difficult to bear her household expenditures. She is 53 years old, married and running a business selling milk. She has done this business for many years with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation, and now she has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo to increase milk sales to earn additional income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo to increase milk sales.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.en: Zarina is 59 years old, married, and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business with her son of selling milk. After collecting milk from buffaloes, her son sells milk door-to-door on his bicycle. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life. Zarina aspires to expand her business and increase the number of animals she owns.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her milk sales.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina de 44 años de edad, tiene doce años de residir en vivienda propia en la cual habita al lado de su compañero de vida, su hija de 12 años y una nieta de 9 años quienes le acompañan cada día y por quienes se esfuerza para que no les falte nada. Reina es una persona trabajadora que en busca de mejorar su calidad de vida diariamente sale a vender queso en la misma vivienda y es con lo cual consigue los ingresos económicos para llevar el sustento diario para su familia. Así también su esposo le ayuda con la economía del hogar, gracias a un humilde trabajo que desempeña. Reina quiere mejorar su calidad de vida, y sabe que para poder estar mejor debe empezar por su casa, en la cual necesita varias cosas pero lo principal y lo que más necesita en estos momentos es un cuarto para la cocina, y es que hasta el momento no poseo con un lugar adecuado para realizar las tareas de la cocina y es por lo que Reina solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: bloques, hierro, cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para la construcción del cuarto para cocina, logrando con esto cambiar un poco su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
44-year-old Reina has been living in her own house for 12 years. She lives with her partner, her 12-year-old daughter, and her 9-year-old granddaughter, for whom she works hard so that they have everything they need. Reina is a hard-working person who goes out every day to sell cheese with the goal of improving her quality of life; this is how she earns enough to support her family. Her husband also helps her with the household economy thanks to the humble work he does.

Reina wants to improve her quality of life and she knows that this needs to begin with making improvements to her house. Her house is missing several things, but the thing she needs most at the moment is a kitchen because she has not had a suitable place for cooking up until now. For this reason, Reina is requesting a loan from FUSAI so she can pay workers and buy cinder blocks, iron, cement, and sand in order to build a kitchen, thereby changing her quality of life a little.

loans.use: to pay workers and buy cinder blocks, iron, cement, and sand for building a kitchen

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to supply herself with five sacks of potatoes.

loans.name: Joselito

texts.en:
A buy-and-sell enterprise is simply understood as buying of a product at a low price and selling the same product at a higher price. The difference between the two costs will be the entrepreneur’s profit. The products may range from cheap pencils to expensive real estate properties, depending on the entrepreneur’s capital.

Joselito, 44, is doing buy-and-sell of various products such as shoes, sandals, slippers, ready-to-wear clothes, rain boots, raincoats, and umbrellas. He has contact dealers from whom he can get the products at lower prices. He has a stall located at the town’s public market in Santa Barbara, Iloilo. He endures the stress and body pains just to supply the daily needs and education expenses of his two children in high school. Lucia, his wife, is a plain housewife who manages their household.

Joselito contemplates how to increase his proceeds. He plans to add more rain boots, raincoats, umbrellas, and rubber slippers because these items are in demand this rainy season. He would like to borrow supplementary capital amounting to PHP 30,000 to procure all these. Your generosity would be a great blessing to him and his family.

He dreams of a stable business and a more comfortable life for his family someday. He is committed to CCT Credit Cooperative’s vision to alleviate poverty, and he regularly meets with his co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of his life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to add more rain boots, raincoats, umbrellas, and rubber slippers.

loans.name: Zatoon

texts.en: Financial constraints alongside the want for a better life and good quality education for her children are only a few but valuable factors that encouraged  Zatoon to start her business by taking a loan from Kashf Foundation. Zatoon is 36 years old and married. In order to meet her household expenses, she started her business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats calves calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales

loans.name: Erick Dani

texts.es:
Dany, de 21 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen un hijo de 4 años de edad, pero también viven 2 hermanos viviendo en su casa.

Dany, se dedica a trabajar como agricultor, este trabajo se lo enseño su padre desde que era un  niño, pero su padre también le heredó un negocio de ropa y otros productos, este negocio lo administra su esposa.

El crédito lo necesita para colocar una tienda de productos de la canasta básica, porque necesita una fuente de ingresos adicional a la que tiene.

Su sueño es seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y comercializar en grandes cantidades.
texts.en:
Dany is 21 years old and studied through high school. He is in a relationship, and his partner does their household duties. They have a four-year-old son, but two brothers live in the house as well.

Dany works as a farmer, a livelihood that his father taught him since he was a child. However, from his father he also inherited a store that sells clothing and other products. His wife manages this business.

He needs this loan in order to start a store selling basic food products, because he needs an additional source of income. His dream is to continue investing in his business and sell in large quantities.

loans.use: to start a grocery store selling basic goods.

loans.name: Sinai Group

texts.fr: Kaningu est commerçante, membre de la banque communautaire «Sinai», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 36ans, mère de 6 enfants dont 5 scolarisés et 1 est encore gosse. Elle est vendeuse des œufs dans la rue du centre-ville depuis 1 an. Elle va s’approvisionner en cinq plaquettes d’œufs. Elle commença son business avec le fonds reçu de son mari. Elle souhaite accroitre son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons à signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés.
texts.en:
Kaningu is a businesswoman and a member of the banque communautaire "Sinai", a client of the microfinance institution Hekima. She is 36 years old, married, and a mother of six children, five of whom are in school and one is still a young child. She has been selling eggs on a street in the town center for one year. She is going to resupply with five cartons of eggs.
She started her business with some funds her husband provided. She wishes to grow her business, to educate and to feed her children. Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support of non bankable entrepreneurs.
(We would point out that certain clients are carrying their babies)

loans.use: to acquire five cartons of eggs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to resupply in part with a bunch of second-hand cloths.

loans.name: La Paix Virunga Group

texts.fr: Kamwite est commerçante, membre du collectif de crédits «La Paix Virunga», cliente de l’IMF Hekima,  mariée, âgée de 45 ans, mère de 8 enfants dont 7 étudient et 1 est encore gosse. Elle est vendeuse des huiles de palmes au marché du centre commercial depuis 20 ans. Elle va acheter 250 litres d’huiles. Elle commença son business avec le capital reçu de son mari. Elle souhaite scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons à signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
Kamwite is a businesswoman and a member of the loan group "La Paix Virunga", a client of the microfinance institution Hekima. She is 45 years old, married, and has eight children, seven of whom are in school and one is still a young child. She has been selling palm oil at the market in the commercial center for 20 years. She is going to buy 250 liters of oil. She started her business with some funds her husband provided. She wishes to educate and to feed her children. Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support of non bankable entrepreneurs.
(We would note that one client is carrying her baby.)

loans.use: to buy 250 liters of oil.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is taking a loan of 1,000 USD to improve her business.

Amelia runs a mini shop which helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy shoes, socks, shirts, pants, shorts, children's clothing, and long- and short-sleeved shirts.

Amelia opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of 600 USD. She is a hardworking woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy shoes, socks, shirts, pants, shorts, children's clothing, and long- and short-sleeved shirts.

loans.name: Adelia

texts.es:
Adelia es una mujer de 42 años de edad, viuda, tiene un hijo de 22 años, y su negocio es el tejido de mantas he hilado de lana.
Ella es buena madre, independiente y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘senkata’ dónde se encuentra la embotelladora de gas natural.
Adelia es de vestir tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es al Aymará y habla español. Su vida la comparte con su hijo que estudia y trabaja, viven en una casa alquilada construida de adobe que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Su negocio es el tejido de mantas e hilado de lana; ella compra lana natural recién cortada de la oveja y la hilvana para confeccionar mantas, inicio su negocio como ayudante he hilvanando lana para otras tejedoras con la ayuda de su hijo se independizo, “viajo largas distancias en el altiplano para buscar la lana de mis proveedores, también compro alpaca y vicuña…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que ella realiza toda la producción, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para la compra de una máquina de tejer y lana por mayor. Su sueño es construir su casa, ella desea comprar una máquina de tejer y lana para producir prendas en cantidad. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 12 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Adelia solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de coser y lana para confeccionar mantas.
texts.en:
Adelia is a 42-year-old woman who is a widow and has one son who is 22 years old. Her business is weaving blankets and spinning wool. She is independent, hardworking, and a good mother. She carries out her business in the Senkata area, where a natural gas bottling facility is located.

Adelia dresses in a traditional way (hat, shawl, and skirt). Her native tongue is Aymará and she also speaks Spanish. She shares her life with her son, who studies and works, and they live in a rented house that is built from adobe and offers basic services.

Her business is weaving blankets and spinning wool. She purchases natural wool recently sheared from the sheep, which she stitches together to make blankets. She began her business as an assistant, stitching wool together for other weavers. With the help of her son, she became independent. "I travel long distances in the high plateau region to get wool from my providers. I also buy wool from alpacas and vicunas", she says.

The advantage of her business is that she does all of her own production. The disadvantage is her lack of capital to purchase a weaving machine and wool in bulk. Her dream is to build her house. She hopes to purchase a weaving machine and wool in order to produce clothing in bulk. This is her first time taking out a loan in the 12 years that she has been running this business. For these reasons, Adelia is requesting a loan for the purchase of a sewing machine and wool to make blankets.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and wool in order to make blankets.

loans.name: Ingrid Magaly

texts.es: Ingrid ya es una socia antigua. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando en una oficina contable particular. Ya termino sus estudios y ahora esta en tramites para que saque un grado de bachiller. Ella solicito el préstamo para hacer los tramites documentas de su bachiller. Se siente muy agradecida de contar con los socios de kiva ya que le ayudado a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en: Ingrid has been a member for a long time now. Currently, she is working in a private accounting office. She completed her studies and is now in the process of filing the paperwork to receive her bachelor's degree. She requested this loan in order to pay to have her bachelor's degree documents processed. She feels very grateful for the support from Kiva members that has helped her to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay to have her bachelor's degree paperwork processed.

loans.name: Erick Anibal

texts.es: Erick ya es un socio antiguo. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando en una identidad publica y tramitando su matricula para ingresar al quinto ciclo de su carrera profesional de Ingenieria Civil. El solicito el préstamo para pagar su matricula y pensiones de la universidad. Se encuentra a dos años y medio de terminar sus estudios de la Universidad. Se siente muy agradecido con las personas de Kiva por ayudarlo a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en: Erick is not a new borrower. He is currently working for a public organization and he is in the process of enrolling at university for another semester of his degree in civil engineering. He is requesting the loan in order to pay his university enrollment and course fees. He is two and a half years away from finishing his degree. He is very grateful to the people on Kiva for helping him to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to pay his university enrollment and course fees

loans.name: Blanca Cecilia

texts.es: Blanca es una confeccionista de 60 años de edad que inició su negocio al afrontar una situación familiar difícil, ella estaba en proceso de separación y las circunstancias le exigieron buscar un medio de sustento para su numerosa familia, ella es madre de cuatro hijos y en vista de las circunstancias decidió poner en práctica los conocimientos obtenidos en Sena una institución del estado en la que aprendió a confeccionar.  Hoy en día cuenta con treinta años en el oficio y confecciona exclusivamente uniformes a entidades privadas, ella realiza las cotizaciones de los diseños y los envía para validación de sus clientes, tan pronto como obtiene una respuesta, inmediatamente empieza su producción. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en materias primas para confeccionar uniformes médicos.  Con esta inversión podrá responder a sus pedidos y continuar en su negocio sin contratiempos. Su meta a futuro es adquirir su casa propia.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 60-year old clothing-maker who started her business after dealing with a difficult family situation. She was in the process of a divorce and the circumstances forced her to look for a way to support her large family. She is the mother of four children and, seeing the circumstances, she decided to put her knowledge from Sena, a state institution where she learned to make clothing, into practice.

Now she has being doing the job for 30 years and exclusively makes uniforms for private organizations. She sets the price of the designs and sends them to her customers for validation. As soon as she gets a response, she immediately starts production.

Currently, she is applying for a Credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to invest in the basic materials to make medical uniforms. With this investment, she will be able to respond to her orders and continue her business without setbacks. Her future goal is to get her own home.

loans.use: to invest in the basic materials to make medical uniforms.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a business women, and she has her own kiosk. Now she is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business.

Fatima opened her kiosk in 2001 with her own working capital of 1,000 USD. She will use the loan to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as detergents, sugar, snacks, cooking oil, slippers, cigarettes, coffee, sardines, biscuits, noodles, lighters, eggs, soft drinks, hard drinks, as well as other things to sell.

Fatima is happy with the loan offered by Tuba Rai Metin which allows her to have more working capital to buy more goods. And she hopes, with this loan, she can increase her income.

loans.use: to buy detergents, sugar, snacks, cooking oil, slippers, cigarettes, coffee, sardines, biscuits, noodles, lighters, eggs, soft drinks and hard drinks.

loans.name: Onja Nantenaina Sophie

texts.fr: Sophie a 22 ans actuellement. Elle est mère de deux enfants de 1 et 6 ans. Celui qui a 6 ans va à l'école en ce moment tandis que l'autre pas encore. Elle est marié et son mari est docker donc son revenu est très faible et aléatoire. Donc pour aider celui-ci dans l'entretien de la famille, elle choisit d'exercer une activité de vente de jouets il y a maintenant six ans. Pour pouvoir augmenter et améliorer le revenu familial, elle voudrait développer et étendre son activité ou plutôt renforcer son fonds de roulement: augmenter et diversifier les quantités des marchandises proposées. Son objectif est d'offrir à ses enfants une meilleure condition de vie et les faire réussir dans leurs études.
texts.en:
Sophie is currently 22 years old. She is the mother of two children, ages 1 and 6 years old - the 6 year old goes to school right now, the other one not yet. She is married and her husband is a docker, so his income is modest and unreliable. So, to help him to take care of the family, she chose to start selling toys six years ago. To be able to increase and improve family income, she would like to develop and expand


a 22 ans actuellement. Elle est mère de deux enfants de 1 et 6 ans. Celui qui a 6 ans va à l'école en ce moment tandis que l'autre pas encore. Elle est marié et son mari est docker donc son revenu est très faible et aléatoire. Donc pour aider celui-ci dans l'entretien de la famille, elle choisit d'exercer une activité de vente de jouets il y a maintenant six ans. Pour pouvoir augmenter et améliorer le revenu familial, elle voudrait développer et étendre son activité ou plutôt renforcer son fonds de roulement: augmenter et diversifier les quantités des marchandises proposées. Son objectif est d'offrir à ses enfants une meilleure condition de vie et les faire réussir dans leurs études.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of toys.

loans.name: Ingrid Marisol

texts.es: Ingrid de 19 años de edad, habita en vivienda propia y vive junto a su familia. Ingrid es una persona emprendedora que busca la manera de salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida, para ello se dedica a la venta de ropa para ayudar en los gastos de su hogar, así también su hermano aporta una ayuda para la economía del hogar. Ingrid hace todo lo posible por cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. Es por ello que Ingrid en busca de mejorar su calidad de vida solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: láminas, clavos, polines y pago de mano de obra para mejorar el techo de su vivienda, ya que se encuentra deteriorado y en los días de lluvia se filtra el agua impidiendo la tranquilidad de Ingrid y su familia.
texts.en:
Ingrid, who is 19 years old, lives in her own home with her family. Ingrid is enterprising and looks for a way to get ahead and better her quality of life. In order to do this, she works selling clothes to help with her home expenses. Likewise, her brother helps by contributing to the household finances.

Ingrid does everything possible to meet the basic needs of her family. Because of this, Ingrid looks to better her quality of life. She asks for a loan from FUSAI to invest in metal sheets, nails, beams and to help her pay for labor to better the roof of her home, as it is deteriorating and during rainy days water leaks through, preventing the tranquility of Ingrid and her family.

loans.use: to in vest in metal sheets, nails, beams, and to pay for manual labor to better the roof of her home.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Del Dorado Group

texts.es: Karina es una mujer emprendedora madre de tres hijos dos mayores de edad y uno en etapa escolar se dedica  a la venta de comida en un local alquilado nueve horas diarias desde hace tres años, se siente muy orgullosa de tener este negocio por que le gusta mucho cocinar y le permite estar en contacto con la gente que la busca por su buena sazón ya que sus clientes se van satisfechos y regresan todos los días a comer sus ricos potajes. atiende a un aproximado de setenta clientes diarios, su mayor meta es tener su local propio y no esta lejos de tenerlo. el préstamo que solicito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos como arroz, azúcar, menestras y mas. Karina se siente muy feliz y afortunada de saber que personas como kiva la apoyan y dice Muchas Gracias no les voy a fallar aprovechare al máximo su ayuda.
texts.en: Karina is an enterprising woman. She has three children; two of them are adults and one is at school. She has made a living by selling food in a rented stall for the past three years. She works nine hours a day. She is very proud to have this business because she really likes cooking and it enables her to be in contact with people. The people patronize her business due to the good seasoning she uses. The customers go away satisfied and come back every day to eat her delicious vegetable stews. She serves approximately seventy customers every day. Her biggest goal is to have her own premises and she is not far away from achieving this goal. She will invest the loan in the purchase of supplies, such as rice, sugar, and vegetable stews. Karina feels very happy and fortunate that the people on Kiva are supporting her and she says: “Thank you very much. I will not let you down; I will make the most of your help.”

loans.use: to buy supplies for making food to sell

loans.name: Ushuhuda Group

texts.fr: Mukene est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise «Ushuhuda», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 40 ans, mère de 5 enfants  qui tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires au domicile dans un quartier commercial de la ville depuis 4 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en 80 kg d’haricots. Elle commença son business avec le capital reçu de son mari. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Mukene is a businesswoman and a member of the banque villageoise "Ushuhuda", a client of the microfinance institution Hekima. She is 40 years old, married, and has five children, who are all in school. She has been selling food products at her home in a commercial neighborhood of the city for four years. She is going to resupply with 80 kg of beans. She started her business with some funds her husband provided. She wishes to buy a plot of land, to educate and to feed her children. Finally, she thanks Hekima for their support of non bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to resupply with 80 kilograms of beans.

loans.name: Angie Dayana

texts.es: Angie es una comerciante que motivada por su hermana se incorporó en este medio y decidieron trabajar en sociedad, ella es una joven soltera de 19 años, que tiene muchos proyectos en su vida personal y su negocio le ha permitido generar ingresos para su bienestar.  Ella comercializa calzado, bolsos, prendas de vestir y cosméticos por encargos que le realizan sus clientes que en su gran mayoría son amigos, familiares y conocidos.  Ella promociona sus productos en las redes sociales y sus clientes le dejan mensajes para que les cotice, en cuanto se cierra alguna negociación, ella procede a comprar el artículo para entregárselo a su cliente con facilidad de pago, sin embargo su capital no le es suficiente porque su demanda se ha incrementado, es por ello que en la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para responder a sus solicitudes de pedidos y comprar nuevas colecciones de mercancías. Su meta a futuro es fortalecer su capital y continuar generando ingresos.
texts.en:
Angie is a merchant who, motivated by her sister, joined her in a partnership. She is a young, single 19-year old girl who has many projects in her personal life and her business has allowed her to get an income for her wellbeing. She sells shoes, purses, items of clothing and cosmetics through orders that her customers make. Most of her customers are friends, family members and acquaintances.

She promotes her products on social media and her customers leave her messages for her to give them prices. When she has come to a negotiation, she proceeds to buy the article to give to her customer with easy payment. However, her money isn't sufficient because the demand has increased. For that reason, she is currently applying for a Credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to respond to her order requests and to buy new collections of merchandise. Her future goal is to strengthen her resources and continue getting an income.

loans.use: to respond to her order requests and to buy new collections of merchandise.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
A 1,500 USD loan has been offered to Elisa to improve her business. She is married, and she has 3 children. She has a mini shop where many people come to buy every day.

With her loan, Elisa will buy shirts, pants, and long- and short-sleeved shirts. She has been involved in her business activities since 2010. She feels very comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Elisa independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, and long- and short-sleeved shirts.

loans.name: Eunice Esther

texts.es: Eunice es una microempresaria que inició su negocio partiendo de actividades que aportaron a lo que es hoy su negocio; ella inició comercializando mercancías varias y cervezas, luego fue incorporando otro tipo de artículos hasta convertir su negocio en una tienda miscelánea en donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos de la canasta familiar, línea hogar, accesorios, celulares, productos de belleza y demás. Eunice está separada de su cónyuge y  es madre de dos hijos, ella es muy organizada y por eso ha tenido éxito en su negocio, en la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar surtido de víveres y abarrotes.  Con esta inversión sus clientes encontraran todo un amplio surtido a su disposición.  Su meta a futuro es realizar adecuaciones al local y su vivienda.
texts.en:
Eunice is a small-businesswoman who started her business based on jobs that supported what her business is today. She started selling various merchandise and beer. Later, she incorporated other types of articules until she converted her business into a miscellaneous store where she offers a large variety of basic family grocery needs. She has house products, accessories, cell phones, beauty products, and more.

Eunice is separated from her partner and the mother of two children. She is very organized and, therefore, has been successful in her business. Currently, she is applying for her first Credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to buy a supply of food and groceries. With this investment her customers will be able to find a large supply at their service. Her future goal is to make improvements to her store and her home.

loans.use: to buy a supply of food and groceries.

loans.name: Manuel Adolfo

texts.es:
Manuel con 54 años de edad,vive en casa propia de material rústico, vive junto a su cónyuge, en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú en una zona rural.Manuel cuenta con muy buena referencias tanto personales como laborales por los moradores de la zona.

Manuel se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz,cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 30 años, el préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cuál no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.

Socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.Firma con cónyuge.
texts.en:
Manuel, 54 years old, lives in his own house made of rustic materials. He lives with his spouse in a rural area in the Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, department of Cajamarca, Peru. Manuel has very good references, both personal and from work, from the inhabitants of the area.

Manuel works in agriculture, specifically the farming of rice. He has 30 years of experience in the area. The loan given to him will be used in farming, the application and use of pesticides, fertilizers, and labor for his harvest. This will help him to improve his crop physiologically, morphologically and productively, as well as to have a timely harvest, and therefore better production and quality of the product. Because of this, he will not have problems selling his product.


The repeat customer of Edpyme Alternativa signs with his spouse.

loans.use: to invest in farming, the application and use of pesticides, fertilizers and labor for his harvest.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura está estudiando el postgrado en didáctica universitaria, por medio de sus estudios quiere poder abrirse camino para poder ayudar a su familia por medio de sus conocimientos, agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo de poder cumplir con sus metas.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus útiles del curso, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Laura is studying in the postgraduate program in university teaching. Through her studies, she wants to be able to open a path to be able to help her family through her knowledge. 

She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving to be able to meet her goals.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay for her course supplies and in this way be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to buy course supplies.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, continua con sus estudios de administración de empresas, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda. Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder pagar de vuelta las cuotas de su carrera, y poder cubrir los gastos de transporte que tiene. 
Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Celia is from the city of Caaguazú. She is continuing her studies in business administration. She commented that her previous loan was used to pay for university fees which helped her to take classes in her major.

Celia is requesting this loan in order to pay her university fees again as well as to cover the cost of transportation. She is very grateful for the opportunity she has received to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees and transportation costs.

loans.name: Anai Magaly

texts.es: Anaí es una joven estudiante de la carrera de Derecho en una universidad local desde hace un año, estudia esta carrera por vocación.ella ha logrado salir adelante a pesar de los obstáculos que se presentan en el camino como es el alto costo de las mensualidades que tiene que pagar. gracias al préstamo que solicitó puede hacerlo sin problema alguno, su meta es terminar de estudiar y trabajar en derecho tributario en una empresa pública, ella agradece a los inversionistas Kiva que apuestan por los jóvenes emprendedores que luchan por salir adelante y ser alguien en la vida y dice "Muchas Gracias Kiva no los defraudaré y sigan ayudando a jóvenes que desean salir adelante".
texts.en:
Anaí is a young student who has been studying Law in a local university for one year. She is studying this by vocation. She has managed to get ahead in spite of the obstacles that have occurred along the way such as the high costs of fees she has to pay. Thanks to the loan she is requesting she will be able to study with no problem.

Her goal is to complete her studies and work in tax law in a public company. She is grateful to the lenders at Kiva who bet on young entrepreneurs who are striving to get ahead and be someone in life who say: " Thank you very much Kiva, we will not let you down. Continue to help young people who want to get ahead".

loans.use: to pay her monthly payments for university.

loans.name: Sabine

texts.fr:
45 ans, veuve depuis quatre ans et demi, sabine est mère de cinq enfants de 8 à 24 ans. L'ainé est déjà marié, le second travaille comme agent de sécurité pour aider sa mère. 
Sabine vend des marchandises générales depuis 2011 et des fruits auparavant. Les fruits sont périssables et il y avait des moments où les ventes étaient à pertes, c'est pourquoi elle choisissait de vendre des marchandises générales non périssables.
Elle voudrait développer et étendre cette activité afin de pouvoir augmenter les bénéfices générées par l'activité.
texts.en:
A widow for four and a half years, Sabine is 45 years old and the mother of five children, ages 8 to 24 years old. The eldest is already married and the second works as a security officer to help his mother.
Sabine has been selling general merchandise since 2011 and sold fruit before that. Fruit is perishable and there were times when the sales were at a loss. That's why she chose to sell general, non perishable merchandise.
She would like to develop and expand her activity in order to be able to increase her profits generated from the business.

loans.use: to buy some general merchandise and cloths.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria  proviene de una familia numerosa, su sueño es recibirse de Contadora Pública y tener su propio estudio contable.  
Comenta que se esfuerza por ser una profesional útil no solo a si mismo, sino también a las demás personas y a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder continuar con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Maria comes from a numerous family. Her dream is to graduate in Public Accounting and have her own accounting firm.

She comments that she exerts herself to be a useful professional not only for herself but also for other people and for her family.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest it in paying the fees for her program and in this way being able to continue with her studies as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay her course fees.

loans.name: Derlis

texts.es:
Derlis es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, estudia la carrera de Ingeniero Industrial, por medio de sus estudios quiere abrirse camino al mundo laboral para poder ayudar a su familia.
Comenta que le gusta mucho su carrera, es por ello que pone su mejor esfuerzo para poder lograrlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la cuota de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Derlis is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. He is studying industrial engineering. Through his studies, Derlis hopes to open up a path into the work work so he can help his family. What Derlis likes about his major is that he has put his best efforts into achieving it.

He is requesting this loan in order to invest in his university fees so that he may continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, cinder blocks, and labor payments for the construction of walls of her home.

loans.name: Luis Raul

texts.es: Luis es un socio antiguo. Actualmente ya se encuentra en el ultimo ciclo de su carrera de Ingeniería de Sistemas. También ya se encuentra trabajando en una identidad publica desempeñando su carrera. El solicito el préstamo para poder pagar sus pensiones retrasadas. Se siente muy agradecido con los inversionista de Kiva por haberle facilitado el préstamo que le ha servido de mucho para cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en: Luis is a former member. Currently, he is in the last stage of his System Engineering degree. He is also working in a public workplace, incorporating his career. He is asking for the loan to be able to pay for his delayed college loans. He is very thankful with the Kiva loaners for making the loans easy which has done a lot for him to meet his goals.

loans.use: to pay his college loans.

loans.name: Eduardo Cesar

texts.es: Eduardo ya es un socio antiguo. Actualmente se encuentra trabajando en una empresa de construcciones y también apoyando a sus padres económicamente. Ya esta en el octavo ciclo de su carrera profesional de Ingeniería Civil y tan solo le falta un año para terminar la Universidad. El préstamo lo solicito para el pago de su matricula de este ciclo y pensiones. El se siente muy agradecido con los socios de Kiva por ayudarlo a cumplir sus metas.
texts.en: Eduardo is a previous member. He is currently working in a construction business and also economically supporting his parents. He is in the 8th stage of his professional Civil Engineering degree and only has a year left until he finishes college. He is asking for the loan to pay for his tuition for this cycle and his loans. He is very thankful with the Kiva members for helping him to reach his goals.

loans.use: to pay for his college loans.

loans.name: Famille Rutaburingonga Group

texts.fr: Le crédit précédent a été fructueux pour Moise car il a scolarisé  et nourri ses enfants, amélioré son habitat, acheté un autre champ pour y planter des eucalyptus. Il reconnaît avoir eu à un certain moment de difficultés de remboursement car lui-même a été obligé de se déplacer pour se faire soigner, les enfants étudiants et élèves finalistes ont sollicité de grands fonds pour terminer chacun son cycle respectif. Ce présent crédit lui permettra de poursuivre l'entretien de ses champs.
texts.en: The previous loan was fruitful for Moise, as he fed and put his children in school, improved his living situation, and bought another field for planting eucalyptus. He recognizes having had difficulties at a time with paying back loans, because he was obligated to take medical leave. The children in high school and going into high school requested funding to each finish their respective school year. This current loan will allow him to pursue managing his fields.

loans.use: To manage his coffee field.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel has been involved in business activities since 2013. She started with her own working capital of $700.00. She is taking a loan from Tuba Rai Metin of $1,000.00. 

She will buy additional supplies with the loan, including cigarettes, candles, oil, noodles, water, sugar, plates, spoons, detergent, soft drinks, rice and other things. She wants to open a big store in the future, so she is taking this loan to improve her management for her business.

loans.use: to buy cigarettes, candles, oil, noodles, water, sugar, plates, spoons, detergent, soft drinks and rice.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, esta estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, y a la vez trabaja.
Es una persona muy sacrificada, ya que estudia y trabaja al mismo tiempo, le gusta mucho su carrera, y es por eso que esta poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder terminarla.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Estela is from the city of Curuguaty. She is studying agricultural engineering and also working. She is a very selfless person because she studies and works at the same time. She likes her career a lot and, for that reason, she is putting her best effort into finishing it. She is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in her college fees. This way she can keep studying as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay for college fees.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.es:
Melissa es estudiante del 2do. año de la carrera de Administración de empresas, actualmente trabaja en una empresa financiera percibiendo ingresos que la ayudan a pagar sus estudios y aportar un poco de dinero en su hogar para ayudar a sus padres. Ella es una persona que se sacrifica por sus metas y anhelos para poder ser una buena profesional.
Solicito el préstamo para pagar su inscripción del año lectivo y cuotas que esta adeudando, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios..
texts.en: Melissa is a student in her 2nd year of Business Administration. She is currently working in a financial company, earning an income that helps her to pay for her studies and bring a little bit of money home to help her parents. She is a person who sacrifices for her goals and dreams to be able to be a good professional. She is asking for a loan to pay her tuition for this year and the fees that she owes. This way she can keep studying.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and fees.

loans.name: Joana

texts.en:
Joana has been involved in business activities since 2009. She started with her own working capital of $500.00. She is taking the loan of $1,000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin. 

She will use the loan to buy additional supplies, including cigarettes, biscuits, cooking oils, milk, ketchup, sauces, noodles, sweets, pens, close up, sugar, tea, coffee, soft drinks and hard drinks and other things to sell. 

She was very happy when Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan for her because she can use this loan to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy cigarettes, biscuits, cooking oils, milk, ketchup, sauces, noodles, sweets, pens, close up, sugar, tea, coffee, soft drinks and hard drinks.

loans.name: Ravaka Tolotriniaina

texts.fr: 20 ans, encore célibataire, Ravaka est une jeune femme travailleuse et dynamique. Elle dirige un magasin général depuis 2014. Elle travaillait avant pour pouvoir économiser de l'argent. Donc elle démarrait le magasin avec ses propres efforts et un coup de pouce de CEFOR. Elle prépare dès maintenant son avenir car elle projette de fonder une famille d'ici quelque temps avec son fiancé et elle s'efforce d'épargner actuellement afin de pouvoir réaliser ce rêve . Elle demande un crédit avec lequel , elle va renouveler ses stocks de marchandises et renforcer ses fonds de roulement pour que son revenu s'améliore.
texts.en: Ravaka, 20 years old and single, is a dynamic and industrious young woman. She has been managing a general store since 2014. She worked before to be able to save some money. So, she started the store with her own efforts and a little help from CEFOR. Currently, she is preparing for her future, as she projects to have a family not far off with her fiancé. She is trying hard to save money now in order to be able to realize her dream. She is requesting a loan with which she will replenish her stock of merchandise and to bolster her working capital to improve her revenue.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of general merchandise like flour, sugar, candles, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina es una persona muy trabajadora que con su marido lucha y se esfuerzan por poder salir adelante, ella comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior lo uso en poder comprar carnes en cantidad para su carnicería, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de cerdos para poder hacer chorizos caseros para la venta en su carnicería y de esa forma tener una mayor variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cristina is a very hard-working person who, with her husband, fights and strives to be able to get ahead. She says that with her previous loan, she used it to be able to buy meat in bulk for her butcher shop, which was a lot of help for her.

Today she is asking for a new loan to be able to invest in buying pigs to make homemade (chorizos) spicy pork sausages to sell in her butcher shop. This way she will have a larger variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy pigs to make (chorizos) spicy pork sausages to sell.

loans.name: Astrid Ivette

texts.es: Astrid es una joven estudiante de la carrera de obstetricia y enfermería en una universidad particular desde hace tres años faltándole dos para terminar la carrera que la apasiona mucho, lo que mas desea es graduarse y ejercer su profesión en alguna clínica o hospital, el obstáculo mas difícil que afronta es la falta de dinero pues las mensualidades son costosas y si no paga a tiempo pierde el ciclo, pero gracias al préstamo que recibió podrá pagar sin problema alguno y seguirá estudiando tranquila. Astrid se siente muy contenta de saber que personas de todo el mundo se preocupan por el futuro de todos los jóvenes que desean salir adelante.Gracias Kiva estoy muy agradecida con ustedes por que me ayudan a lograr mis metas trazadas.
texts.en:
Astrid has been a young student in the obstetrics and nursing program at a private university for three years, needing two [more years] to complete the program that she is very passionate about. What she wants most is to graduate and practice her profession in some clinic or hospital. The most difficult obstacle that she faces is the lack of money, since the monthly payments are expensive, and if she doesn't pay on time, she misses the semester.

But thanks to the loan that she received, she will be able to pay without any problem, and she will continue studying serenely. Astrid feels very happy knowing that people from all over the world are concerned about the future of all the young people who want to get ahead. "Thanks to Kiva, I am very grateful to you because you are helping me to achieve my planned goals."

loans.use: to pay the monthly university fees.

loans.name: Bibiana Guada

texts.es: Bibiana tiene 28 años de edad, es de estado civil soltera, vive con su madre que tiene 68 años quien depende de su hija económicamente, ella vive en un lugar rural de la ciudad , por lo tanto la señal de teléfonos móviles es nula, su negocio es el servicio  de cabinas telefónicas  para que la comunidad pueda comunicarse hacia otras ciudades y las personas que transitan por este lugar también lo usen, ella necesita el crédito para la implementación de dos cabinas en su local, así ella incrementara sus ganancias y dará un servicio a su comunidad.
texts.en: Bibiana is 28 years old and single. She lives with her mother, who is 68 years old and financially dependent on her daughter. She lives in a rural area of the city where there is no signal for cell phones. Her business is providing telephone boxes so that the community can communicate with people in other cities. People passing through this area also use the telephone boxes. Bibiana needs the loan so she can install two telephone boxes on her premises, thereby increasing her profits and providing a service for the community.

loans.use: to buy two telephone boxes

loans.name: Karen Raquel

texts.es: Karen tiene 34 años de edad, ella esa madre soltera, tiene dos hijas Cinthia de 12 años y Lisseth de 6 años, para sacar adelante a sus dos niñas ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, vive en el sector rural, solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlos en la compra de pollos pequeños, la aspiración de Karen es que sus hijas se gradúen y tengan mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Karen is 34 years old. She is a single mother. She has two daughters, Cinthia, age 12, and Lisseth, age 6. In order to raise her two daughters, she raises and sells chickens. She lives in a rural sector. 

She is applying for the money from the loan in order to to invest it in the purchase of little chicks. Karen's aspiration is that her daughters can graduate and have better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en:
Fernanda is 40 years, and she is married. She has a kiosk to generate income for her family. She has been thinking about how to run a big business, but she does not have enough working capital. 

She feels better when she applied for her first loan, and she is applying for her second loan of $1,000.00. She will buy some additional supplies to keep in her store such as a refrigerator, Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, beer, water, biscuits, shop, shampoo, fish, coffee, sugar and slippers.

She is happy with TRM (Tuba Rai Metin), which offers loans to poor people.

loans.use: To buy refrigerator, Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, beer, water, biscuits, shop, shampoo, fish, coffee, sugar and slippers

loans.name: Rosa Esmeralda

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil casada, se dedica a la producción y venta de leche, ella es madre de tres hijos, Andrés de 22 años, Sarita de 19 años, y  Xavier de 17 años,  todos estudiando,  gracias a su trabajo y dedicación puede sustentar los medios para que sus hijos reciban una buena educación.
Rosa necesita de este crédito para invertir en más vacas, así podrá aumentar su negocio de producción de leche, espera subir su tasa de ganancias para  apoyar las  necesidades básicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa, 40, is single and earn a living producing and selling milk. She's the mother of three children: Andres, 22; Sarita, 19 and Xavier, 17. All are in school, and thanks to her work and dedication she can support the means for them to receive a good education.

Rosa needs this loan to invest in more cows. This way she can grow her business producing milk. She hopes to increase her rate of income to support her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Bertha Concha

texts.es:
Bertha es una señora que se dedica a la crianza y venta de chanchos es madre soltera, y ha sabido salir adelante sola, tiene una hija de 11 años de edad gracias a su dedicación y constancia le puede brindar a su hija una educación de calidad.
Bertha pide este crédito para poder invertir en su negocio, incrementando más chanchos y así poder aumentar los ingresos para su familia
texts.en:
Bertha is a woman who earns a living raising and selling pigs. She's a single mother and has learned to get ahead by herself. She has an 11-year-old daughter and is able to provide her with a quality education, thanks to her dedication and constancy.

Bertha is asking for this loan to invest in her business, increasing the number of pigs and thus growing her family's income.

loans.use: to raise pigs.

loans.name: Teresa Alejandrina

texts.es: Teresa tiene 53 años de edad, de estado civil casada, su esposo es jornalero,  tiene 6 hijos, tres hombres y tres mujeres de los cuales 2 viven con ella, Fernanda su hija menor se dedica a estudiar  gracias al duro trabajo de sus padres. Vive en el sector rural,sus ingresos los obtiene de la crianza y venta de animales menores, va a invertir el crédito en la compra de una vaca para incrementar su negocio al que se dedica 25 años, su aspiración es lograr que su hija tenga una educación superior y pueda sacar un título profesional, y así seguir luchando por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Teresa is 53 years old and married. Her husband is a day laborer. She has six children: three boys and three girls. Two of them live with her. Fernanda, her youngest daughter, studies thanks to the hard work of her parents. Teresa lives in a rural area. She earns a living by breeding and selling small animals. She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow in order to expand her business, which she has been working in for 25 years. Her goal is for her daughter to have a higher education and obtain a degree. In this way, she will continue fighting for the wellbeing of her family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Juleita

texts.en:
Juleita is in agriculture, and she is planting vegetables. After the vegetables grow, she will bring them to the market to sell. 

She started planting vegetables in 2014 with her own working capital of $200.00. Now she is requesting a loan of $600 from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to improve her business. 

Everyday, her life is planting vegetables because she is earning a good income from it. She is taking the loan from Tuba Rai Metin to increase her business, and she is taking the loan to buy more manure, other vegetable seeds, pumpkin seeds and other things.

loans.use: to buy more manure, other vegetable seeds, pumpkin seeds and other things.

loans.name: Yony Luzmila

texts.es:
La socia Yony pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” .
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de agricultura, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas de café entre otros.
La socia Yony agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Yony belongs to the “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” communal bank.

She continues to work in agriculture. She has been doing this work for a while and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day. She wants to be able to continue working so she can continue to support her family.

Yony is requesting the loan in order to buy coffee seeds and other supplies. She appreciates and is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her monthly repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy coffee seeds and other supplies

loans.name: Vya Renda Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Vya Renda” está en su sexto ciclo del programa de comités de la fundación paraguaya, están también dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, esforzándose por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Francisca quien según su encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, esta en una situación de pobreza extrema, pero ella se encuentra mejorando poco a poco por medio de su esfuerzo y sumado a la venta de ropas de manera ambulante que hace, viene mejorando sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Agradece por esta oportunidad y pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The "Vya Renda" group is in its 6th loan cycle with the program committees of the Paraguayan Foundation. They are also in the poverty elimination program, striving to be able to improve their and their families living conditions.

One of the members is Francisca, who, according to her poverty elimination survey, is in an extreme poverty situation. But she is improving little-by-little through her effort, in addition to selling clothing on the street. She is improving her living conditions and those of her loved ones. She is thankful for this opportunity and is asking for the loan to invest into buying various items of clothing to sell, to be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
La socia Marlene pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú.
La Marlene continua con su negocio de  productos de belleza como por ejemplo aretes, perfumes, collares, pulseras entre otros para sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de colonias entre otros.
La socia Marlene agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Bank member Marlene belongs to the communal bank "Virgencita de Fátima de Lamay" of the Arariwa Association in the province of Calca in the department of Cusco, Peru.

Marlene continues with her beauty products business, with such items as earrings, perfumes, necklaces, and bracelets, among other items that her customers request from her. She has had her business for some time, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She wants to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue helping her family.

She is applying for the loan for the purchase of colognes, among other items.

Marlene appreciates and values the loan and promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to purchase colognes, among other items.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
La socia Aurelia pertenece al banco comunal “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco, Perú.
La socia Aurelia continua con su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia continua criando a sus animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia Aurelia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes entre otros.
Al momento de tomar la foto la socia se volteo ya que la socia es timida.
texts.en:
Aurelia belongs to the “Virgencita De Fátima De Lamay” communal bank, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the province of Calca in the department of Cusco in Peru.

Aurelia continues to raise animals. She has had this business for a while and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her business very day. She continues raising her small animals and selling them to clients. She wants to be able to continue working so that she can continue to support her family.

Aurelia appreciates and is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her monthly repayments on time. She is requesting the loan in order to buy guinea pigs and other things.

When the photo was taken, she turned away slightly because she is shy.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and other things

loans.name: Lidiana

texts.en:
Lidiana lives in Maubesse. She is married, and she is a business women. She has been doing business since 2005 with her own working capital of $200.00. 

She is requesting a loan of $1,000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to add to her working capital to buy more additional supplies to keep in her store: water, hand body, shampoo, candy, books, medicines, diapers, biscuits, coffee, soap, sardines, Gillette, including soft drinks and other things to sell. 

She is taking this loan because she wants to make her kiosk a big store in the future.

loans.use: to buy water, hand body, shampoo, candy, books, medicines, diapers, biscuits, coffee, soap, sardines, Gillette and soft drinks.

loans.name: Luis Humberto

texts.es:
Luis se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes, es padre de ocho hijos, de los cuales vive con uno, todos ellos no recibieron educación por falta de ingresos económicos, ahora ninguno tiene una profesión para trabajar, Don Luis lucha cada día para alimentar a sus cuyes, pues a pesar de que el clima sea malo, tiene que conseguir la hierba para alimentar a sus animalitos.
Luis necesita de este crédito para incrementar su negocio, pagar los servicios básicos, lograr alimentarse y cubrir sus necesidades básicas.
texts.en: Luis works raising and selling guinea pigs. He is the father of 8 children, of whom one lives with him.
