None of them went to school due to lack of money, and now none of them has a profession for work. Luis fights each day to feed his guinea pigs, despite the weather being bad, he has to get grass to feed his small animals. Luis needs this loan to increase his business, pay for basic services, get food and cover his basic needs.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel es un joven de 29 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive con su padre y su madre todos los sábados de cada mes Miguel se despierta muy temprano para dirigirse al mercado de chanchos, en ese lugar realiza la compra y venta de esta especie porcina, con el dinero que obtiene compra nuevas crías y las vuelve a vender, repite este proceso cada vez que los animales están adultos, este negocio es un sustento para su pequeño hogar.Miguel necesito el dinero del crédito para comprar más chanchos y así poder tener más ganancia al momento de venderlos.
texts.en:
Miguel is a single 29-year-old young man who lives with his father and mother. Every Saturday, Miguel wakes up very early to take the pigs to market. At the market, he buys and sells this pig species.

With the money he earns, he buys new piglets and returns to sell them, repeating this process every time the animals are adults. This business sustains his small house. Miguel needs the loan money to buy more pigs and thus be able to have more income when he sells them.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Freda

texts.en:
Freda is a 31-year-old married woman with four children. She lives in a rural area near Honiara, the capital of the Solomon Islands.

She runs a poultry business selling chicken in her community or at the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for one year.

Freda requested a loan of $7,500 to buy young chicks, chicken feeds and materials to improve her poultry shed such as sago palm leaf, nails and nets. She hopes to meet her children's school fees with the profit she makes with her business and also help cover her family's weekly expenses.

She has been a SPBD member since 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy young chicks, chicken feeds and materials for the poultry shed such as nails, sago palm leaf, and net for her business.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Loida to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy fish.

She has been involved in her business activities since 2014. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Loida independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Anunciacion

texts.es:
Anunciación, es viuda, vive con su hija y nietos, tiene más hijos pero ya no viven con ella, tiene un tortillería desde hace 20 años, es así como cubre las necesidades familiares, su hija le apoya mucho en  atender a las personas que visitan su negocio.
Con el crédito podrá comprar a bajo costo maíz, leña, cal, bolsas y gas propano, tendrá materia prima para elaborar la venta de tortillas, considerando que los precios en el mercado pueden subir ella estará preparada para atender mucho mejor a sus clientes.
Sus aspiraciones son mantener su negocio con vida y apoyar a su familia económicamente.
texts.en: Anunciación is a widow and lives with her daughter and grandchildren. She has other children but they do not live with her. She has had a tortilla-making shop for 20 years and this is how she covers her family's needs. Her daughter supports her a lot in attending to the people that visit her business. With the loan, she will be able to buy low cost corn, firewood, lime, bags and propane gas. She will have the basic materials to make and sell tortillas. Considering that the prices in the market could go up, she will be prepared to attend to her customers much better. Her aspirations are maintaining her business with life and supporting her family economically.

loans.use: to buy low cost corn, firewood, lime, bags and propane gas. She will have the basic materials to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Heber Avilio

texts.es:
Heber, cultiva maíz para consumo familiar y para vender, además tiene una venta de frutas, el negocio lo tiene instalado en el mercado aledaño a su domicilio, él es la única persona que trabaja para salir adelante con su familia, vive con su esposa de 35 años de edad y sus hijos de 15, 10 y 7 años de edad.
Se aproxima la segunda temporada de siembra durante al año, solicita un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar mozos para sembrar maíz,  tiene mucha fe en tener cosechas abundantes, con las que alimentara a su familia y tendrá posibilidades de generar mejores ingresos.
Sus sueños son tener una casa más grande y apoyar a sus hijos para que se superen académicamente.
texts.en:
Heber grows corn to eat and sell. He also has a fruit stall. His business is located in the market adjacent to his home. He is the only person that works to get his family ahead. He lives with his 35-year old wife and children, ages 15, 10 and 7.

The second planting season for the year is coming up and he is asking for a loan to buy agricultural supplies and to pay workers to plant corn. He has a lot of faith in having abundant harvests, which will feed his family and give him the possibility to get a better income. His dreams are to have a bigger house and support his children so they can academically succeed.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to pay workers to plant corn.

loans.name: Valle Sagrado De Urubamba Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO DE URUBAMBA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ofelia ella es conviviente y tiene 26 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “VALLE SAGRADO DE URUBAMBA” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

The member is Ofelia. She is in a common-law realtionship and is 26 years old. She works in her grocery store business. She sells basic food items like rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She wants to get ahead through her business. She is an enterprising and hard-working woman. Her dream is to expand her grocery store business. She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

The members who are in the attached photos had their photos taken after the meeting as they asked permission to be late due to their work.

The other members work in a business selling food, a business selling clothing, a grocery store business and a restaurant.

The member thanks those who form part of this dream through this loan and promises to comply with the payment of her installments in the established time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and cookies.

loans.name: Dolores Narciza

texts.es: Narcisa es una señora de 37 años, tiene 3 hijos menores de edad, Luis de 16, Fernanda de 14 y Anita la ultima de 6 años, ella es una persona muy responsable con sus hijos y con  su trabajo, Narcisa se dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero, gracias a esta actividad puede sacar adelante a toda su familia  y puede costear de una manera carente una educación para sus tres hijos.  Por eso es muy necesario  ayudarle con uno de nuestros microcréditos, será de mucha utilidad para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Narcisa is a 37-year-old woman who has three minor children. Luis is 16, Fernanda is 14 and Anita, the youngest, is six. She is a very responsible person with her children and her work.

Narcisa earns a living raising milk cows. Thanks to this work, she's able to bring her family up but can scarcely afford education for her three children. As a result, it's very necessary to help her with a microloan. It will be very useful for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Berlides Del Socorro

texts.es: Berlides es una microempresaria residente en San Jacinto un municipio de Bolívar en donde inició su negocio, aprovechando la leche que su esposo le provee de su finca, elabora quesos y suero que comercializa a sus vecinos y personas de barrios aledaños, alternamente a esta actividad aprovecha sus dotes de artesana para elaborar hamacas, mochilas y cualquier tipo de prenda que sus clientes le soliciten.  Berlides cuenta con 25 años de experiencia y es muy conocida en San Jacinto, ella desea continuar en su negocio muy consolidada y mejorando cada día más, es por ello que está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y comprará una licuadora industrial y materias primas para sus artesanías.  Esta inversión permitirá que su producción de productos lácteos sea más ágil y que cuente con el hilo necesario para la elaboración de sus artesanías.  Su meta a futuro es tener un negocio más tecnificado y adecuar un local comercial.
texts.en:
Berlides is a microentrepreneur residing in San Jacinto, a township of Bolivar, where she began her business, taking advantage of the milk that her husband provides from his farm. She makes cheeses and buttermilk that she sells to her neighbors and people from surrounding areas. Alternating with this activity, she takes advantage of her artistic gifts to make hammocks, backpacks, and whatever type of garment her customers request from her. Berlides has 25 years of experience and is very well known in San Jacinto.

She wants to continue in this business, which is very established and is improving every day. It is for this reason that she is applying for her first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will buy an industrial blender and basic materials for her craft work. This investment will allow her production of dairy products to be more agile, and she will have the thread necessary to make her handicrafts. Her goal for the future is to have a more high-tech business and set up a commercial location.

loans.use: to buy an industrial blender and basic materials for her artisanal cheese

loans.name: Claudia María

texts.es:
Claudia, de 29 años de edad, es de oficios domésticos, está acompañada y tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales dos asisten a la escuela, su pareja es agricultor y ayudante de albañil.

Claudia, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar sus hijos, anteriormente trabajaba como empleada y vendiendo de verduras y frutas.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar abono y aplicarlo a 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y frijol.

Claudia, sueña que sus hijos crezcan y sean profesionales; además sueña con mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Claudia, who is 29 years old, does household tasks. She is married and has four children, of whom two go to school. Her partner is a farmer and mason's assistant. 

Claudia does domestic work and cares for her children. In the past, she worked as an employee and selling vegetables and fruits.

The loan will be used to buy compost and apply it to 7,000 square meters of corn and beans.

Claudia dreams that her children can grow up to be professionals. In addition, she dreams of improving her home.

loans.use: to buy compost and apply it to 7,000 square meters of corn and beans.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge es un mecánico reconocido en el municipio de San Juan de Nepomuceno y su idea de negocio surgió después de haber laborado en un taller de mecánica en donde renunció para empezar su proyecto de negocio. Este emprendedor hombre inició su negocio hace 17 años  y durante la trayectoria de su taller, ha logrado consolidar a su clientela, la cual solicita servicio de reparación y mantenimientos de motocicletas y bicicletas, medios de transporte que son muy utilizados en esta población.  En la actualidad  está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará repuestos de motocicletas y bicicletas para poder ofrecer servicios más agiles y efectivos. Su meta a futuro es tener un local propio y continuar ofreciéndole bienestar a su familia y una educación de calidad a sus hijos.
texts.en: Jorge is a well-known mechanic in the municipality of San Juan de Nepomuceno and his business idea emerged after having worked in a mechanic shop where he quit to begin his own business project. This entrepreneurial man began his business 17 years ago and during the trajectory of his workshop, he has strengthened his customer base, which requests repair and maintenance service for motorcycles and bicycles, transportation modes that are very common in this town. He is currently applying for his first loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which he will buy motorcycle and bicycle replacement parts to be able to offer more flexible and effective service. His future goal is to have his own shop and to continue offering wellbeing to his family and a quality education for his children.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle and bicycle replacement parts.

loans.name: Jose Sebastian

texts.es:
José, tiene el negocio de compra y venta de ganado, vive con su compañera de vida y dos hijos, todos son dependientes de él, su negocio lo tiene desde hace 12 años, el oficio lo aprendió apoyando a su padre a realizarlo, normalmente trabaja de ocho de la mañana a cinco de la tarde, su ventaja es que ya es una reconocida entres sus clientes y la experiencia que lo respalda.
Comprará una vaca y profilácticos, aumentara el ganado y lo cuidara mejor, espera continuar mejorando su negocio para atender a más clientes y generar ganancias para cumplir con sus obligaciones, 
Su visión es establecer mejor la ganadería y cambiar el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en:
José has a business buying and selling cattle. He lives with his life partner and two children. They are all dependent on him. He has had his business for 12 years. He learned the profession by supporting his father in carrying it out. He normally works from eight in the morning until five in the evening. His advantage is that he is well-known among his customers and the experience that he has behind him.

He will buy a cow and prophylactics to grow and better care for his cattle. He hopes to continue improving his business in order to attend to more customers and generate income to fulfill his obligations.

His vision is to better establish his cattle and to change his family's way of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow and prophylactics to grow and better care for his cattle.

loans.name: Enel De Jesus

texts.en:
Enel is a 47-year-old married man who lives in the municipality of Urrao. He has 4 children, 3 daughters and 1 boy. They are between 15 and 4 years old and are the motivation of Enel’s life.  They make him always go further. Since 2012, he’s been running his own business. He grows different kind of fruits, and he inherited from his family. 

He works hard because he wants to accomplish great things with his business. He expects that he can increase his clients and sales so he can get more profits.  He would love to see his business last a long time and increase his growing. He asked for a loan so he can buy fertilizers, poison and pay for some workforce. 

Enel has many dreams. He wants to pay for his children education and some day leave them the business. He also would like to buy a house for all of his family. Help him start accomplishing all his dreams. A loan will do a lot for him.

loans.use: buy fertilizers, poison and to pay for some workforce

loans.name: Josefa Elizabeth

texts.es:
Josefa, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañada, tiene cinco hijos de los cuales, solo uno estudia y todos los demás ya son mayores de edad, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y su esposo a la agricultura y a la pesca artesanal.

Josefa, trabaja dando clases en una pequeña escuela de su comunidad, atreves de un programa llamado “Visión Mundial”, ella siempre se ha preocupado por el bienestar de su familia y de su comunidad.

Josefa, necesita el dinero para comprar abono para la milpa, porque la primera temporada fue muy mala y no pudo obtener cosecha para los gastos de la siguiente producción.

A futuro sueña con que su hija sea profesional o aprenda un oficio que la ayude a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Josefa studied through high school, is in a long-term relationship, and has five children, one of whom is in school while the others are older. Josefa takes care of the household chores while her husband works in agriculture and traditional fishing. Josefa also teaches in a small school in her community, through a program called "Visión Mundial" [World Vision]. She has always cared about the wellbeing of her family and her community.

Josefa needs this loan in order to purchase fertilizer for her cornfield, because the first season of the year was very bad and the harvest did not cover the costs of planting for the next season. Her dream for the future is for her daughter to become a professional or learn a livelihood that helps her move forward.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her cornfield.

loans.name: Noemy Elizabeth

texts.es:
Noemy, manifiesta que el crédito anterior le ha sido de mucha utilidad para mantenerse vendiendo tortillas, su situación financiera son estables y su familia conserva el mismo número de miembros, en éste tiempo no ha tenido dificultades en su negocio.
Considera que es importante hacer una nueva solicitud para un crédito que utilizara para comprar maíz, leña y cal así preparara la venta de tortillas, espera que sus clientes continúen prefiriendo su producto.
texts.en:
Noemy states that the previous loan has been very useful to continue selling tortillas. Her financial situation is stable and her family has the same number of members. In this time she has not had difficulties in her business.

She considers it important to request another loan that she will use to buy corn, firewood, and lime to make tortillas to sell. She hopes her customers continue preferring her product.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, and lime to make tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is 45 and lives with her son and brother in the main city of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has a job outside of the city, and so one of her brothers lives with her for care-taking. Her efforts and sympathies are with her brother. Her younger brother is a driver by profession and been providing transportation services in the main city. He has been driving over local and unpaved roads. Due to jerks and continuous driving its body is badly damaged. Passengers do not like to travel in his ugly looking vehicle and do not feel tranquil because his rickshaw rattles during driving. He wants to replace the rickshaw's body with a new one but does not have enough cash in hand.

The reason Naseem has requested a Kiva loan from field partner BRAC Pakistan is so her brother will be able to buy a new rickshaw body made of polyester. She hopes that after its replacement her brother can drive drive the rickshaw smoothly.

Naseem praises Kiva's system and supporting lenders.

loans.use: to buy a polyester rickshaw body for her brother.

loans.name: Ranet

texts.en: Ranet is 20 years old, a single student. He is from the Prey Veng Province of Cambodia. He is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in medicine, and is in his second year. His parents earn their main income from farming. Due to the lack of financial support, Ranet would like to request a loan to pay for his third-year tuition fees. This loan will help Ranet have enough finances to go through the third year at the university successfully. For his future goals, he dreams of saving enough money to run his own business.

loans.use: to pay for his third-year tuition fees

loans.name: Abel

texts.en: Abel is 49 years old and he lives in a village in the western region. Abel is a farmer, and with only the farming he manages to cover his family’s everyday needs. On his farm, he has cows, calves, bulls, pigs and sheep. With the help of his wife, Abel organizes his farm products, especially milk and ghee, for sale in the town center. He would like to enlarge the number of his farm cattle, which would mean more income for his family and better living conditions for his children. This loan of UGX 2,000,000 will help Abel to purchase two more calves for his farm and also fodder for all his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle for sale.

loans.name: Iris Xiomara

texts.es: Iris, tiene 41 años de edad, es una madre soltera que vive con sus 3 hijos en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Barbara. Ella siempre se ha dedicado a la sastrería y hace 4 años vende ropa y accesorios en enchape de oro como aretes, pulseras, cadenas, anillos y otros y también cuenta con su propia pulpería donde vende productos como ser: Granos básicos, huevos, sopas, especias, embutidos, carnes y lácteos. Ella ha obtenido varios prestamos en ODEF para sostener sus actividades de negocio, actualmente solicita otro préstamo de 10,000.00 Lempiras el que planea invertir en compra de productos alimenticios como granos básicos, carnes, refrescos, lácteos, para vender en la pulpería y compra de más ropa y accesorios en enchape. Su plan es hacer crecer su negocio y darles un mejor sustento y educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Iris is 41 years old and a single mother who lives with her three children in a small town in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Barbara. She has always worked in tailoring, and for four years she has been selling clothes and gold-plated accessories like earrings, bracelets, necklaces, rings, and others. She also has her own small grocery store where she sells products like basic grains, eggs, soap, spices, various types of meat, and dairy products.

She has received several loans from ODEF to sustain her business activities, and is now requesting another loan of 10,000 Honduran Lempiras. She plans to invest this money in the purchase of basic food products like basic grains, meats, beverages, and dairy products, as well as clothes and more gold-plated accessories. Her plan is to make her business grow and give her children better support and education.

loans.use: to purchase food products like basic grains, meats, beverages, and dairy products, as well as clothing and metal-plated accessories to sell in her store.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 49-year-old lady living with her spouse and six children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She wants to save so that she can provide better living facilities for her children, but it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.

Her son has been driving a rickshaw for several years, but his income is insufficient to feed his entire family. He has to maintain the motorbike and rickshaw’s body but he does not have sufficient cash in hand to fix the problem.

Parveen has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so her son will be able to buy the rickshaw’s body. She hopes that she will be able to save enough to meet the sudden needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw body for her son's profession.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is single. He has been working as a shift manager at Gentherm Ukraine Company for 10 years. Alexander has a stable income source. He lives together with his mother and takes care of her.

Alexander is asking for a loan of 35,000 UAH to install a fence in front of the house and around the garden. Also he wants to install a new plumbing system and put an extra heater in the house. The loan will help to improve the living conditions for Alexander and his mother.

loans.use: to install a fence, plumbing system and add an extra heater to his house.

loans.name: Omar 50091 Group

texts.en:
Nisrine is the featured borrower for Omar 50091 Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Nisrine is a 36-year-old married mother of one child and a pregnant woman. Ten years ago, she started selling home products to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family. She is a hard worker who is well known in her region. Nisrine is trying desperately to develop her business and provide her family with decent living conditions. Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay the expenses of her childbirth and to increase her merchandise with new items and products to satisfy her customers' needs. Nisrine is the first lady on the left of the photo.

With respect to the other group members, Riham is a 23-year-old married mother of three children who wants to pay her children's school tuition fees and develop her embroidery business. She is the second lady on the left. Rima is a 23-year-old married mother of one child, who wants to renovate her house and pay her child's school tuition fees. She is the second lady on the right. Nourma is a 21-year-old married woman who wants to renovate her house. She is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to pay the expenses of her childbirth and increase her merchandise with new items and products

loans.name: Chay

texts.en:
Chay is a 53-year-old married man who lives in the remote village of Kampong Chhnang Province. Chay and his spouse help each other in farming activities in order to put the family in better living conditions. He has been engaged in this field for 25 years with the average income of USD 1.5 per day. 

At the moment, Chay would like to order a solar home system to install at his home. This will allow his family members to gain access to clean energy, helping them with light at night. They also can use radio or TV for their entertainment. Due to the shortage of funds, he has requested a loan from Kiva to buy a solar home system. He is very happy and thankful, because with this loan purpose, HKL has provided him a special interest rate than its general loan rate. Chay awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity.

loans.use: to buy a solar home system.

loans.name: Richel

texts.en: Richel is 35 and single. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She has a handicraft business in the Philippines and has been in this business for over 8 years. Richel has requested a loan from GDMPC micro-credit. She will use the loan to purchase more materials to expand her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for bag-making.

loans.name: Anjali Devi And Group

texts.en:
Anjali Devi hails from the Tiruchirappalli district of Tamil Nadu. She lives there with her husband and her teenaged child. She works as a daily wage labourer in the agricultural fields.

Adding the income earned by both Anjali Devi and her husband, they earn INR 11,000 every month. But they end up spending INR 9,000 out of it on household expenses.

Anjali Devi realized that the seasonal nature of her work was preventing her from earning adequate income. She thus undertook training to start her own business. She learnt how to make kadalai urundai (peanut chikkis).

She feels selling peanut chikkis would be a more steady source of income. She expects to earn an additional INR 1300 every month.

Anjali Devi is joined by four other women from the same village who also want to start their peanut chikki-making businesses. They have applied for a loan to do the same. The loan will help these women fulfill the needs of their families and fund their children’s education.

loans.use: to start her new business of making and selling kadalai urundai (peanut chikki or candy).

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 45 years old. She is married to David and they are blessed with 3 children aged between 21 and 14 years.

She has had a farming business for 20 years, currently earning a monthly income of KES 30,000. She has borrowed KES 40,000 from VisionFund Kenya as her third loan, after repaying the previous loan successfully.

Hannah will be using the loan to purchase farm inputs like fertilizers and seedlings.

With the anticipated profits she will be able to buy food for the family and pay school fees for her children, as well as repay her loan.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to have a well-established business and enjoy a better life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs like fertilizers and seedlings

loans.name: Jesica Daniela

texts.es: Jessica Huera tiene 20 años de edad y una pequeña hija de dos años, es madres soltera y de edad temprana para tener una responsabilidad de esa magnitud a su cargo, vive con su madre en el campo, ella es la encargada del cuidado de la niña mientras Jessica trabaja. Comenta que sus ingreso los obtiene gracias a la crianza de ganado lechero, Jessica va a invertir  el crédito en la compra de una vaca, espera salir adelante y darle una vida de calidad a su hija por medio de este negocio.
texts.en:
Jessica is 20 years old and has a two-year-old daughter. She's a single mother and is young for having such a responsibility on her shoulders.

She lives with her mother in the countryside. Her mother looks after the child while Jessica works. She says she earns income thanks to the growth of her milk cow business.

Jessica is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow. She hopes to get ahead and give her daughter a quality life through this business.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Sidonia

texts.en:
A $ 1000 loan is offered to Sidonia to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day.

She will buy some additional supplies such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, coffee, and slippers. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2013. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Sidonia independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, coffee, and slippers.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.en:
Ana is a 57-year-old married woman who lives in the municipality of Tierralta. Ten years ago, she decided to start her own business raising chickens and pigs. She learned to do this all by herself, something she feels really proud of and which has allowed her to provide for her family.

The lack of money hasn’t allowed her to invest in her business in order to improve it and make it bigger, and she has been wanting to increase her profits for a while. Now that she found Interactuar and Kiva, she feels like she has the opportunity to do great things. She asked for a loan so she can buy pigs and chickens and food for them.

Ana dreams of having a successful and recognized business with a lot of customers that will allow her to give to her family the best quality of life. You can be part of Ana’s story by loaning and getting her closer to her goals.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens and food for them.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 25-year-old married mother of one child. Five years ago, she started working with her husband in his beauty salon to help him in covering the needs and expenses of their family. Alaa learned this domain in an institute where she gained professional skills.

Alaa is a hard worker and ambitious lady who is well-known among her customers. Today, she is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy make ups and cosmetics to provide her customers with better service.

Alaa and her husband hope to expand their business more in the future to increase their income and provide their child with descent living conditions.

loans.use: to buy makeup and cosmetics to provide her customers with better service.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El es un señor viudo de 60 años de edad. Trabaja en un taller automotriz como mecánico, desde hace varios meses su trabajo se ha visto afectado debido a que padece de cataratas en su ojo derecho, su médico dice que es por la edad. El procedimiento quirúrgico que necesita le resulta muy costoso, ya que sus recursos económicos no le alcanzan para solventar dicho tratamiento.
texts.en:
He is 60 years old, a widower, and works in an auto repair shop as a mechanic. For several months, his work has been affected due to the fact that he suffers from cataracts on this right eye.

His doctor says it is because of age. The surgical procedure he needs turns out be very costly, and his scarce financial resources are not sufficient to pay for this treatment.

loans.use: A loan of $625 helps this borrower to obtain eye treatment

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es un joven madre de familia, durante el embarazo de su hijo le encontraron un crecimiento anormal en la superficie externa del ojo izquierdo, en la etapa gestante no pudo ser intervenida, esta preocupada por su salud ya que no cuenta con ningún servicio medico por medio de la empresa donde trabaja, necesita ser intervenida de urgencia para evitar un daño mayor a su vista.
texts.en: She is a young parent. During the time she as pregnant with her son, an abnormal growth was found on the external surface of her left eye. During the stage of her pregnancy, it could not be operated on. She is concerned for her health, as she has no medical services through the company where she works. She needs to be operated upon urgently to avoid greater damage to her health.

loans.use: to pay for eye treatment

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El cuenta con 47 años de edad es casado, su ocupación es técnico de moldeo en una fabrica. Sufre de una enfermedad crónica la cual desgraciadamente nunca se atendió, por lo que ha visto afectado varios órganos el más dañado es el de la vista ya que padece de cataratas, esto ha empezado a afectar en sus actividades diarias.
A él le urge una cirugía lamentablemente no cuenta con los medios suficientes para tratarse.
texts.en:
He is 47 years old and married. He is a molding technician in a factory. He suffers from a chronic illness, which unfortunately was never attended to, so various of his organs have been affected. The most damaged is his vision, as he suffers from cataracts. This has begun to affect his daily activities.

He is being encouraged to have surgery, but unfortunately he does not have enough means to obtain treatment.

loans.use: to obtain eye treatment

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella tiene 40 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja, es asistente administrativo en una dependencia publica. Padece de una enfermedad que le provoca perdida de la vista, se ha sometido a tratamientos para mejorar su agudeza visual sin ningún éxito, esta enfermedad es progresiva, la única alternativa que tiene  es una tratamiento quirúrgico especializado, cirugía poco común lo que la hace muy costosa, de no ser operada podría llegar a la fase final de su enfermedad y solo quedaría realizar un trasplante de cornea.
texts.en:
She is 40 years old and lives in a common-law relationship with her partner. She is an administrative assistant in a public office.

She suffers from an illness that causes loss of vision, and has undergone treatments to improve her visual acuity, without any success. This illness is progressive, and the only alternative she has is a specialized surgical treatment. It is an uncommon surgery, which makes it very costly. Unless she is operated upon, she could reach the final phase of her illness and the only remaining option would be a corneal transplant.

loans.use: to obtain eye treatment

loans.name: Selso

texts.es:
Selso con 33 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyugue y sus dos menores hijos de 11 y 5 años de edad de los cuales el primero cursa primaria en colegio nacional, en el distrito de Cañaris, provincia de Ferreñafe, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú. Antonio cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.

Selso se dedica la actividad de la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro de 4 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.

Selso es socio recurrente para nuestra institución. Firma solo.
texts.en:
Selso, 33 years old, has a cohabiting marital status. He lives in his own home, of simple material, with his spouse and their two young children of 11 and 5 years of age. Of them, the first is in primary at the national school in the Cañaris district of the Ferreñafe province in the Lambayeque department of Perú. Antonio has very good personal and professional references from the residents of the area.

Selso works in the agricultural business, specifically in cultivating coffee. He has 4 years of experience in the sector. He will use the loan that is to be granted to him for agricultural labor, the application and incorporation of crop protection products, fertilizers and for labor costs for his harvest. In this way, it will help him to improve the physiology, morphology and productivity of his crop, as well as to have an opportune harvest. In the end, he will have increased production and a better quality of product, for which he will have no problem selling his produce.

Selso is a recurring member of our institution. He signs alone.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural labor, the application and incorporation of crop protection products, fertilizers and for labor costs for his harvest.

loans.name: Justiner

texts.en:
Justiner is 57 years old. She is married and has six children. Her business is tailoring, selling used clothes, and farming. She has been in the business for 11 years. She earns a monthly income of eight thousand Kenyan shillings. This is her second loan with VisionFund Kenya. 

She will use the loan to purchase a sewing machine.  She will use the profits from the expanded business to pay the school fees for her children.  Her hopes and dreams are to have a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for her tailoring services.

loans.name: Nyamai

texts.en:
Nyamai is 32 years old. He is married and has one child. His business is farming and motorcycle taxi. He has been in this business for 13 years. He earns a monthly income of twenty thousand Kenyan shillings. 

This is his first loan from VisionFund Kenya. He will use the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and farm chemicals for his farming business. He will use the profits from the expanded business to pay the school fees for his children. His hopes and dreams are to expand his business and have a better business and a better family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and farm chemicals for his farming business.

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en: Nidal is a 29-year-old married father of two children. He is employed as a truck driver in a cleaning company since 2010. He is his family's sole breadwinner. Since his wife doesn't work, she takes good care of her family members. His limited monthly income is barely enough to cover their increasing living needs. Thus, he acquired a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua. He will use the loan to pay for his children's school tuition fees and stationary expenses. This is his second loan cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower. He proved to be a good-standing borrower with an encouraging repayment history. Nidal hopes to be promoted in his job to make sure he can provide his children with a better education in order for them to benefit from a better future.

loans.use: To pay for his children's school tuition fees and stationary expenses.

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en:
Winfred is 29 years old. She is married and has three children.  

Her business is farming. She has been in the business for 15 years. She earns a monthly income of twenty-five thousand Kenyan shillings. 

This is her first loan term with VisionFund Kenya. She will use the loan to purchase farm inputs of fertilizer and seeds.  

She will use the profits from the expanded business to pay the school fees for her children. 

Her hopes and dreams are to have a happy family and a financially stable business.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs of fertilizer and seeds for her farming business.

loans.name: Yeny Lizeth

texts.es: Yeny, es una madre soltera que reside en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Barbara, tiene 32 años de edad y vive con sus 2 hijos. Actualmente ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de mercadería desde hace siete años, vende sus productos de forma ambulante en barrios y aldeas de Azacualpa. Anteriormente se dedicaba al trabajo asalariado en una maquila. Ofrece productos como, blusas, faldas, pantalones, entre otros. Ya ha solicitado varios préstamos en la institución los que le han ayudado a mantener estable su negocio. Solicita la cantidad de 10,000.00 Lempiras para aumentar el inventario y obtener más clientes. Comprará más productos para su negocio como pantalones, camisas, blusas y jeans para aumentar las ventas. Su meta es crecer como micro-empresaria y generar más ingresos para brindarles una  mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Yeny is a single mother who lives in the city of Azacualpa, Santa Barbara. She is 32 years old and lives with her two children. She has had a business selling merchandise for seven years. She sells her products on the streets, in the neighborhoods and villages of Azacualpa. She previously worked a salaried job in a factory. She offers products like blouses, skirts and pants, among others. She has already requested several loans from the institution, which have helped her to keep her business stable. She requests 10,000 Lempiras to increase her inventory and to obtain more customers. She will buy more products for her business like pants, shirts, blouses and jeans to increase her sales. Her goal is to grow as a small businesswoman and to generate more revenue to provide a better quality of life to her children.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses and jeans to increase her sales.

loans.name: Twitezimbere Group

texts.en: Floride, 55-years-old, is a group leader. She is married with four children between 21 and 31 years old and three of them go to school. The group is called TWITEZIMBERE, which means “LET US IMPROVE” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses to have a better standard of living. She sells airtime(units that are uploaded in a mobile phone in order to make calls) and has been running this business for six years. With the loan, she would like to buy more airtime credits and money transfer to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to pay for medical insurance.

loans.use: To purchase more communication units(airtime for sale)

loans.name: Fouzia

texts.en:
Fouzia is a 30-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan with her spouse and three children. Her husband has been running a small printing press for three years. Flex is a sheet of polythene widely used to deliver high quality digital print for outdoor hoardings and banners that are mainly printed by large color plotters. These prints are used instead of handwritten banners for its low cost and durability. He prints advertisement banners and logo on order.

Fouzia belongs to a poor family and is solely responsible for her children.She wants to grow her husband's business so he can easily generate additional income, so he can provide for her children and can bear the medical expenses of his parents.
  
Therefore, she has requested a Kiva loan, so her husband can buy polythene sheets and colors plotters to print more flex. In this way; he can easily generate additional income for his family. Fouzia deserves Kiva's support. She hopes that the Kiva lenders will support her.

She is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy polythene sheets and colors plotters for her husband's printing business.

loans.name: Sheela

texts.en:
Sheela’s husband has been driving a moto rickshaw for many years. It has been depreciating with the passage of time. He sold his old rickshaw and wants to buy a new rickshaw. He belongs to an ultra poor family and has been feeding his children. Now his children are growing old, and their needs are growing as well.

Sheela has been making savings for many days to buy a new moto rickshaw for her husband, but at the time of purchasing, they were short some money. Therefore, Sheela has requested a loan for her husband so that he can buy a new moto rickshaw with the contribution of savings.

Sheela is a 30-year-old woman living with her four children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She hopes that now her husband will be able to generate more income. She is very happy after taking this loan. She thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new moto rickshaw for her husband's transportation service.

loans.name: Twiyubakiricyizere Sub Group B

texts.en:
Twiyubakiricyizere is a group led by Sylvine, who is 28 years old. The group name means “build our love” in English.

Sylvine is married and has one child who has 4 years. She sells foodstuffs and has been doing this business for the past 10 years.

The group members sell different items, and they have the same idea for changing their lives.

With this loan, she would like to buy more rice, tomatoes and bananas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and improve her standards of living.

loans.use: to buy more rice, tomatoes and bananas to sell.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan is a 47-year-old, divorced mother of four children. Two years ago, she started selling cotton wear to cover the needs and expenses of her children. After her divorce, she became the only breadwinner of her four kids, and she is working hard to provide them with decent living conditions.

Today, Sawsan is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees, and she also wants to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of cotton wear to satisfy her customers' special requests.

Sawsan hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and stay capable of improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees and increase her merchandise with a new collection of cotton wear.

loans.name: Jinky Rose

texts.en:
Jinky lives at Piat with her child. In order to gain income, she manages a store and sells grocery items and also cook meals for sale. She is a responsible mother and provides for the needs of her child.

She would like to increase her merchandise but has insufficient funds, so she is asking for additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy more grocery items (canned goods, soft drinks, biscuits, soap and noodles) and ingredients to cook and sell. This will help increase her sales and profits as well.

She hopes to become a successful entrepreneur someday.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and ingredients to cook and sell

loans.name: Sakon

texts.en:
Sakon, 42 years old, is a fisherwoman who lives in Santuk district, Kampong Thom Province. She is a hard-working mother of three children. Her husband is also a fisherman far away from their house. This couple can make a net profit of approximately USD $10 a day.

During this time, Sakon is facing a financial issue in her family. She needs some money to buy wood to build her new house, but she can’t yet afford it. After getting to know that HKL provides Kiva loans with a lower interest rate than its normal loan, she has decided to apply for a Kiva loan to help them.

She would like to thank all lenders for their kindness.

loans.use: to buy wood to build her new house

loans.name: Hernán

texts.es: Hernán es un microempresario que encontró en la venta de helados una oportunidad de sacar adelante a su familia, él consideró que sería un productos de gran consumo puesto que su ciudad de residencia, Cartagena de Indias es muy calurosa y las personas buscan refrescarse de algún modo.  Hoy en día cuenta con seis años en la labor, recorriendo por las calles de esta alegre ciudad y vendiendo a transeúntes de los diferentes barrios un amplio surtido de helados; paletas de frutas tropicales, galletas de helado de crema, turrones y demás.   En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar un congelador y surtirlo con helados de este modo tendrá el inventario requerido sin contratiempos. Hernan es casado y es padre de dos hijos mayores de edad, su meta a futuro es tener puntos de venta en la ciudad y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Hernan is a small business owner who saw am opportunity in the ice-cream business. He knew that it would be a good product to sell in his hometown, Cartagena de Indias, as it is very hot and people need a way to cool down.

He has now been in the business for six years, selling his ice-creams up and down the streets of this cheerful city to residents of different neigborhoods. He offers a wide selection: tropical fruit ices, ice-cream cookies, nougat and things like that.

He is applying for his first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo foundation, so he can buy a freezer and a selection of ice-creams. This will mean he has enough stock to keep him going.

He is married and father of two adult children. In the future, he would like to set up different selling points in the city and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and a selection of ice-creams.

loans.name: Tursunoy

texts.ru: Турсуной приобретела новую швейнуб машинку. У нее дела идет отлично. Она очень рада и шьет с удовольствием на новой машинке. ТУрсуной очень благодарно на Вашу поддержку. Она успешно погасила предыдущий кредит. Турсуной замужем и мать двоих детей. У нее 18 летняя дочь, и 24 летный сын. Мужу 40 лет. Сын учится в университете. Дочка школьница. Турсуной  обратилась за кредитом, для оплаты за учебы сына. У Турсуной нет такая сумма денег, и она была вынуждена, обратится к Вам за кредитом. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Tursunoy has obtained a new sewing machine. Her business is going fantastically. She is very happy, and sews with pleasure on the new machine. Tursunoy is very grateful for your support. She has successfully repaid her previous loan. 

Tursunoy is married and the mother of two children. She has an 18 year old daughter, and a 24 year old son. Her husband is 40 years old. Her son is studying at university. Her daughter is a school student. 

Tursunoy has applied for a loan in order to pay for her son's studies. Tursunoy does not have enough money, so it is necessary for her to turn to you for a loan. She believes in you and your support.

loans.use: to pay for her son's education.

loans.name: Summaira

texts.en:
SUMMAIRA’s husband has been doing working as laborer in a firm which provided a low income. For this reason he decided to get into the auto rickshaw Business. He wants to buy an auto rickshaw to generate income for entire family. However, due to a lack of funds, he is unable to purchase new rickshaw.
SUMMAIRA has been making savings to help with the purchase. Now SUMMAIRA has requested a loan for her husband so that her husband can buy new rickshaw with the the loan and the contribution of savings.  
SUMMAIRA is a 33 year-old woman, living with her three sons and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She hopes that now her husband will be able to generate more income. She is very happy after taking this loan and says thank you to the lenders.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw with the contribution of saving for her husband.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan se dedica a revender pan, vive con su esposa y dos hijas de 8 y 3 años de edad, su pareja administra una tienda de productos de la canasta básica, en ocasiones sus parientes le apoyan económicamente, aprendió el oficio como empleado, posteriormente decidió tener su negocio propio y lo hace con un horario de tres de la mañana a ocho de la mañana.
El crédito le servirá para comprar una motocicleta en la que saldrá a revender pan, tendrá posibilidades de llevar más producto para atender a nuevos clientes  y dar un mejor servicio, piensa que si administra bien el capital tendrá resultados positivos.
Su mayor sueño es mejorar y ampliar su vivienda para que su familia tenga un techo seguro.
texts.en:
Juan sells bread for a living. He lives with his wife and two daughters, who are eight and three years' old. His wife runs a grocery store selling basic household goods. On occasions, his parents support him financially.

He learnt his trade working in this sector. He later decided to set up his own business and works from three in the morning until eight.

He will use the loan to buy a motorcycle, which he will use to sell his bread to his clients, offering a better service and a more efficient delivery service.

He is confident that he can invest the money well enough to get positive results. His ultimate dream is to improve and extend his home so that his family have a roof in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to deliver bread more efficiently.

loans.name: Famille Tembeaone Group

texts.fr: Avec le crédit reçu, Dominique a paillé son café, payé la main d'œuvre et exécuté d'autres travaux champêtres. Ainsi, il a nourri sa famille et acheté une moto pour le taxi. Ce présent crédit sera aussi orienté dans les mêmes travaux champêtres.
texts.en: With the loan received, Dominique mulched his coffee plants, paid for labor and performed other farm-related tasks. This enabled him to feed his family and buy a motorcycle taxi. The present loan will now also be devoted to the same field work.

loans.use: prepare and cultivate land used for coffee plantation

loans.name: Zarrinamo

texts.ru: Женщина с прекрасной улыбкой, Зарринамо. Ей 39 лет. Она из города Турсунзаде. Зарринамо замужем и мать двоих детей. Дочке 17 лет, сыну 12 лет. Зарринамо трудолюбивая и заботливая мать и жена. Она в течение 10 лет занимается торговлей деятельности. Зарринамо  продает детскую осеннюю одежду. У нее качественные и хорошие одежды. Вот так она зарабатывает на жизнь. Зарринамо хочет расширить деятельность и увеличить товарооборот. Она запрашивает кредит для перевоза  больше одежды на продажу. Зарринамо нуждается на Вашу поддержку. Вы можете поддержать ее сейчас!
texts.en:
The woman with a fantastic smile is Zarrinamo. She is 39 years old. She is from Tursun-zoda city. Zarrinamo is married, and mother of two children. Her daughter is 17 years old, and her son is 12 years old. 

Zarrinamo is a hardworking and caring mother and wife. She has been engaged in her retail business for 10 years. Zarrinamo sells children's autumn clothing. She has a wide range of good clothes. In this way she makes a living. 

Zarrinamo wants to expand her business and increase her turnover. She is asking for a loan in order to transport more clothes for sale. Zarrinamo needs your support. You can support her now!

loans.use: to transport children's clothes for sale.

loans.name: Khurmatbi

texts.ru: Хурматби 50 летняя женщина. Она жительница района Шахринав. Хурматби замужем и у нее четверых детей. Муж занимается таксистом на районе. Дети заняты учебой. У Хурматби 10 летный опыт работы в швейном деле. Сейчас Хурматби  помогает мужу обеспечить семьи. Она шьет женскую одежду у себя дома на заказ. Ей в работе помогает дочка после учебы. Хурматби планирует, взят кредит, и за счет кредита купит швейную машинку и  швейные принадлежности. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей расширить швейное дело. По этой причине Хурматби обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
Khurmatbi is a 50 year old woman. She is a resident in Shahrinav district. Khurmatbi is married and she has four children. Her husband is a taxi driver in the area. Her children are busy with school. 

Khurmatbi has 10 years of experience in the sewing business. Now, Khurmatbi helps her husband to support the family. She sews women's clothes to order from home. Her daughter helps her with work after school. 

Khurmatbi plans to take a loan, and buy a sewing machine and sewing supplies with the funds. The requested loan will help her to expand her sewing business. Thus Khurmatbi has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: María Consuelo

texts.es:
María, de 49 años de edad, está acompañada, es madre de 3 hijos, se dedica al comercio y destazo de cerdos, su compañero de vida se dedica a la agricultura y vive solamente con una hija.

María, se dedica al destazo de cerdos desde que se acompaño, ella decidió dedicarse a este negocio porque ya no tenia ingresos y no podía aportar a los gastos del hogar y está es una manera útil para colaborar con su hogar.

El crédito lo utilizara para comprar abono y pesticidas para aplicarlo a sus cultivos.

El sueño de María, es trabajar duramente para sacar a sus hijos adelante, prepararlos academicamente y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
49-year-old Maria has a partner and three children. She makes a living by selling and butchering pigs. Her partner makes a living from agriculture and lives with his daughter.

Maria has made a living by butchering pigs since she started seeing her partner. She decided to go into this business because she did not have any income, she was not able to contribute towards the household expenses, and this was a useful way of contributing to the household.

She will use the loan to buy compost and pesticides for applying to her crops. Maria’s dream is to work hard in order to support her children, give them an education, and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and pesticides to apply to her crops

loans.name: Sinia Lisseth

texts.es:
Sinia, de 28 años de edad, está acompañada, es madre de 2 hijos, estudio hasta primer año de bachillerato, su compañero de vida se dedica a la agricultura y también trabaja como motorista.

Sinia, siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, esta actividad la realiza junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos.

El crédito fue utilizado para comprar abono y pesticidas para aplicarlos al cultivo de maíz y de frijoles.

Sinia, sueña con seguir trabajando para sacar adelante a sus hijos y mejorar sus ingresos para tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
28-year-old Sinia has a partner and two children. She studied up until the end of the first year of her high school diploma. Her partner makes a living from agriculture and he also works as a driver.

Sinia has always worked in agriculture; she does this work together with her partner and children.

The loan was used to buy compost and pesticides for her maize and bean crops.

Sinia dreams of continuing to work in order to support her children and improve the household income enough to get their own house.

loans.use: to buy compost and pesticides for her maize and bean crops

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing in bundles to sell them in season.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma owns a rice field. She toils working the land and growing rice. She has three children ages 4, 7 and 12. She struggles to support their needs. Her partner earns a living by operating a habal-habal (a motorcycle with an extended seat), transporting passengers from one place to another, in remote areas. Together with her family, she lives in the town of Dulag, Leyte.

She would like to boost her livelihood by using the funds from Kiva's field partner, CEVI, to buy farm supplies like fertilizers and rice seedlings, and to perform maintenance on the farm tools. It could enhance the yield of her farm and guarantee a bountiful harvest.

In the future, Alma would able to pay her obligations and continue to provide the basic needs of her family, including sending her children to get a quality education.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizers and rice seedlings, and perform maintenance on the farm tools.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.en:
Maria is 56 years old and lives in the municipality of Tierralta. Unfortunately, this woman became a widow, but that hasn’t stopped her. It has only made her stronger, so much so that she started her own business in order to provide for her and her family. She owns a business raising pigs and chickens.

She wants to improve her business so it can give her better profits and be sustainable but the lack of capital hasn’t allowed her to invest. So she’s asking for a loan to buy some pigs, chickens and feed.

Maria dreams of having a successful business that will allow her to improve the conditions of her house. You can help this hardworking woman to accomplish this and more with just a loan.

loans.use: to buy some pigs, chickens and feed.

loans.name: Isnelda

texts.es: Isnelda es una emprendedora ama de casa que aprovecho sus dotes en la cocina y  los contactos que su cónyuge tiene en la labor que se desempeña; él es contratista de obras de construcción, por lo tanto tiene a su cargo a un gran grupo de obreros que requieren de almuerzos los medios días, de este modo ella inició a elaborar sus primeros platillos que entrega a domicilio en la obra donde se encuentren realizando sus labores.  Ella se dedica a esta actividad de lunes a viernes y a partir de las 6 a.m. inicia con la preparación de los alimentos para que sus comensales tengan oportunamente sus comidas.  Sus almuerzos están constituidos por una porción de proteína, ensalada, legumbres, arroz, sopas y refrescos una alimentación sana, balanceada  y exquisita que tiene cautivados a sus clientes. Alterno a su actividad principal, ella comercializa productos por catálogos y de esta actividad comercial recibe buenos ingresos que aporta para el beneficio de su familia. Isnelda requiere mantener costos bajos en las materias primas que utiliza en su negocio, es por ello que está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar víveres al por mayor y cancelará unos encargos de mercancías varias de su catálogo.  Esta inversión favorecerá sus ventas y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Isnelda is an enterprising housewife who made the most of her culinary skills and the contacts that her husband has from work. He works as a building contractor, which means he has a large group of workers in his charge that need lunch. In this way, Isnelda started to make the first dishes which she delivers to the place where they are working. She does this work from Monday to Friday. She begins preparing the food at 6 a.m. so that the workers get their meals on time. Her lunches include a portion of protein, salad, vegetables, rice, soup, and soft drinks. It is healthy, balanced and delicious food that captivates her clients.

In addition to her main work, she also sells products through catalogs. She receives good income from this work, which she uses for the benefit of her family.

Isnelda needs to keep costs low for the supplies that she uses in her business; for this reason, she is applying for her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to buy supplies wholesale and pay for some orders for some merchandise from her catalog. This investment will increase her sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy supplies wholesale and pay for some orders for some merchandise from her catalog

loans.name: Rosa Erlenci

texts.en:
Rosa is 44 years old and lives in the municipality of Norcasia. She has one son who is 22 years old that she loves very much and with whom she has an amazing relationship. Four years ago Rosa made the decision to start her own business so she can provide for her family.

Now she raises cattle. As an entrepreneur, Rosa is always thinking about ways to improve her business. However, the costs of the cattle are really high so it isn’t easy to buy them. With the help of Kiva and Interactuar she will be able to increase her profits. The loan she’s requesting will allow her to make some improvements in the feeders and waterers, and also to buy a dairy cow.

Rosa has many dreams, but her son is the most important thing in her life. Her biggest dream is to pay for an excellent education for him so that he can be a professional. You can help Rosa to get closer to achieving all of her goals with just a loan.

loans.use: to make some improvements in the feeders and waterers, and to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Lusilia

texts.en:
Lusilia is applying for a loan of $600 to improve her business. She is married and has two children.

She runs a business in her home selling shirts, trousers, shorts and children's wear. She opened her mini-shop a year ago with her working capital of $600.

She lives in a town near the main road, so many people come to buy and every day she sells items. She makes a good income, and wants to buy more inventory with the loan.

loans.use: to buy shirts, trousers, shorts, and children's wear.

loans.name: Gaston Esteven

texts.es: Gastón es un comerciante que emprendió su propio negocio de cafetería y pizzería en la ciudad de Cartagena en el año 2014; tras recibir una liquidación de su anterior empleó decidió asociarse con un amigo que había tenido experiencia en negocios de este mismo formato y juntos sacaron adelante el proyecto. Él es un joven de 28 años, soltero y con muchas expectativas de crecimiento, es por ello que su compromiso es tan grande y todos los días de la semana está dispuesto a recibir a la clientela en su negocio a partir de las 8 a.m. en horario extendido hasta las 10 p.m., un horario muy amplio para que puedan degustar de una variedad de productos de panadería, repostería, mecatos, refrescos y comidas rápidas. Gastón está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar un horno pizzero e insumos, y así poder responder a la capacidad de su negocio, en estos momentos las pizzas que prepara están teniendo muy buena acogida por el público y el horno que actualmente tiene no le da abasto. Esta inversión le permitirá tener un servicio más ágil y se más productivo.  Su meta a futuro es que su negocio se más reconocido y en lo personal desea casarse y conformar una familia.
texts.en:
Gaston is a businessman who started up his café and pizzeria in Cartagena in 2014. He used an allowance from his former employer, investing the money with a partner who had experience in this line of business. Together they were able to get it off the ground.

He is 28, single, and very ambitious. That is why he is very committed, serving customers from eight in the morning until ten at night. During these extensive open hours, his customers can enjoy a variety of baked goods, cakes, snacks, drinks and fast food.

He is applying for his first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo foundation so that he can buy a pizza oven and some ingredients. This will help him satisfy customer demand, given that the pizzas are very popular with the public and the oven he has at the moment cannot cope. It will help him offer a more efficient service.

In the future he wants his business to gain a good reputation and on a personal note, he would like to get married and start a family.

loans.use: to buy a pizza oven and ingredients.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is applying for a loan of $600 from TRM (TubaRaiMetin). She is 32 years old and runs a kiosk in front of her house. She lives in a town near the school; her kiosk is located in strategic place where many people come to buy, including students.

She will use the loan to buy inventory to keep in her store such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, biscuits, beer, Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sagiko and slippers.

She makes good money from selling and she wants to apply for a bigger loan in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, biscuits, beer, Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sagiko and slippers.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel has received a number of loans in the past which have greatly sustained her tailoring business. She is glad to have been able to invest in this kind of business which not only enabled her to send her children to school but give her fulfillment doing what she loves most.

This time again she trusts she can still request for a PHP 10,000 loan to buy additional supplies of fabric, thread and other materials needed to sew blouses, dresses, pants, etc. She values her loyal and increasing customers, and puts forth her best effort into giving them the best service. She thanks God for Kiva and CCT for using them as instruments to assist small business owners like her.

Maribel hopes to buy a new sewing machine to improve her services. She loves seeing her children finish their studies and pursue a bright future. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies.

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fabric, thread and other materials to use in her tailoring business.

loans.name: Katherine Giuliana

texts.es:
Katherine con 20 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive junto a sus padres, en casa familiar, en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú, en una zona urbana. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales como laborales por los moradores de la zona.

Katherine se dedica a la actividad de servicio de transporte urbano en mototaxi, desde hace más de 2 años de antigüedad. Solicita préstamo para el mantenimiento y reparación de su mototaxi, de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

No a tenido préstamos con nuestra institución.
texts.en:
Katherine, 20, single, lives with her parents in their family home. They reside in Cayalti, Chiclayo in Peru. This urban area comes under the Lambayeque department.

She has gained a good reputation, both professionally and socially, from the service she offers to those in her area.

She has been offering a transport service using her motor taxi for the past two years.

She is asking for a loan to carry out repairs and maintain her vehicle. This will allow her business to grow, increase her income and therefore, improve her quality of life.

This is the first loan she has applied for through this organization.

loans.use: to repair and maintain her motor taxi.

loans.name: Azucena Beatriz

texts.es:
Azucena con 37 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia, junto a su cónyuge e hijos, en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú.Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de dicha localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Azucena se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, desde hace más de 5 años.Solicita préstamo para la compra de mercadería, de esta manera satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes, obteniendo mayor utilidad para ella y su familia.

Socio recurrente, si ceunta con un historial crediticio en nuestra entidad financiera.
texts.en:
Azucena, 37, lives with her partner and children in their own home in the Lagunas district in the provine of Chiclayo, Peru. This falls under the Lambayeque office. The locals here mostly work in livestock, agriculture and commerce.

She has very good references from the locals, on both a personal and professional level. She has been selling clothes for ladies, gentlemen and children for five years now.

She is asking for a loan to buy clothes so that she can satisfy customer demand, which will help her family by generating more income.

She has used this organization for loans in the past.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Bertha Isabel

texts.en:
Bertha Isabel is 51 years old and lives in the municipality of Tierralta. She has dreamed of having her own business since she was a little girl because she has an entrepreneurial soul. She accomplished that 10 years ago when she started raising pigs and chickens, which she learned to do on her own.

She lacks capital so she hasn’t been able to invest in her business. This is something she wants to do to increase her profits and make her business last in the long term, which will allow her to better provide for her family. She’s asking for a loan so she can buy pigs, chickens and feed.

Bertha Isabel dreams of improving the conditions of her house that are not in the best shape so her family can live in safety and be more comfortable. You can help her accomplish all of her dreams with just a loan.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens and feed.

loans.name: Felis Fermin

texts.en:
Felis Fermin is 30 years old and lives in the municipality of Tierralta. He’s a single man with a big heart. He loves his family and provides for them thanks to a business that he started five years ago. He has a farm where he grows different kinds of products, something he learned on his own.

The lack of capital hasn’t allowed him to do some things he wants to do in order to improve his business. He expects that an investment will let him increase his profits and will make his business sustainable. He’s asking for a loan so he can buy agricultural inputs and to pay for some technical assistance.

Felis Fermin dreams with buying a house for his family, something that he’s been dreaming of for many years and now see as a real possibility. With a little help from you this can be completely real, so please contribute to this loan.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and to pay for technical assistance.

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Amélé est une femme mariée âgée de 21 ans qui vit avec un enfant à charge à Baguida. Amélé est une revendeuse de condiments qui achète ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile et dans les quartiers environnant. Amélé sollicite ce prêt pour commander des bols de gombo sec et de piment écrasé en vue de bien vendre et d’avoir un bénéfice pour aider son mari à bien organiser l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en: Amélé is 21 years old, married, with one child under her care.  She lives in Baguida and resells spices. She buys her goods at the market twice a month and resells them from home and in the neighborhood.  Amélé is taking a loan in order to buy several bowlfuls of dry okra and crushed chili.  Her goal is to sell enough merchandise to make a profit and help her husband take care of the children's education.

loans.use: to buy four bowlfuls of dry okra and four bowlfuls of crushed chili.

loans.name: Sanobarjon

texts.ru: Санобарчон 62 летняя сильная и активная женщина. Она из города Турсунзаде. Санобарчон замужем и имеет одну дочь. И у Санобарчон есть один внук. Ее дочь находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, и она каждый месяц отправить денег домой. Мужу 64 года, и он пенсионер. Сама Санобарчон тоже пенсионерка, но она не может сидеть без дел, и Санобарчон занимается маленьким бизнесом. Она около 10 лет занимается шитьем женской одежды. Санобаржон решила отремонтировать дом, потому что она давно хотела отремонтировать и жить уютно и комфортно. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Санобарчон просит кредит. Она надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Sanobarjon is a 62-year-old strong and active woman. She is from Tursun-zoda city. Sanorbarjon is married and has one daughter. Sanorbajon also has one grandson. Her daughter is working in Russia, and every month she sends money home. Sanorbajon's husband is 64 years old, and he is retired. 

Sanobarjon is also retired, but she is unable to sit idly, thus Sanorbajon is running a small business. She has been sewing women's clothes for about 10 years. 

Sanorbajon has decided to renovate her house, because she has long wanted to renovate and live comfortably. Because of insufficient funds, Sanorbajon is asking for a loan. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials for home renovation.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es:
Raúl, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañado, tiene dos hijos, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar más debido al nivel de pobreza que tenía y por eso tuvo que trabajar.

Raúl, siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura y a trabajar como jornalero.

Raúl, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono, pesticidas y fertilizantes para sus cultivos.

A futuro espera que sus hijos lleguen a ser profesionales y no tengan que sufrir tanto como él.
texts.en:
Raul, 32, only has a fourth grade education and was unable continue his education because of his level of poverty which meant he had to go to work.  He has a partner and two children.

Raul always has worked in agriculture and as a hired hand.  He is in need of a loan to buy manure, pesticides and fertilizers for his crops.

In the future he hopes his children will become professionals and not suffer as much as he has.

loans.use: To buy manure, pesticides and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
Elias con 37 años de edad ,de estado civil conviviente, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus 5 menores hijos, vive en casa propia de material rústico, en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, departamento de Cajamarca,pais Perú, en una zona rural.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican al cultivo de café, maíz y hortalizas.

Elias se dedica a la actividad de la agricultura, cultiva cafeto, de la variedad catimor, se dedica a la agricultura hace 15 años y hace 4 años cultiva cafeto. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores y cultivo de productos de pan llevar.El destino del crédito será para el mantenimiento de su cultivo, con ello obtendrá buen rendimiento y mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Elias es socio recurrente en nuestra institución Edpyme Alternativa. Firma con cónyuge.
texts.en:
Elias, 37, lives with his common-law wife and five minor children in their own rustic house in the district of Santo Tomás, province of Cutervo in the department of Cajamarca in Peru.  It is a rural area and the locals grow coffee, corn and vegetables.
