Elias works in agriculture and grows the catimor variety of coffee trees.  He has been in the trade for 15 years and growing coffee trees for four.  He also raises and sells small animals and grows other crops.  The loan will be used for crop maintenance to produce a good harvest and earn more income.  This will improve the family's quality of life.

Elias is a returning member of our Edpyme Alternative institution.  He and his wife are both signing.

loans.use: care for his crops.

loans.name: Bénédiction A Group

texts.fr: Muulwa est commerçante, trésorière du groupe de crédits «Bénédiction A», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 30 ans, mère  de 2 enfants scolarisés. Elle est propriétaire d’une boutique sur la route principale de la ville depuis 2 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en sacs du sucre et savon Omo. Pour commencer son activité, elle avait demandé un crédit. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Muulwa is a retailer and the treasurer of the "Bénédiction A" credit group.  She is 30 years old, married, and a client of the Hekima micro-finance institution.  She has two children who attend school.  For the past two years she has been owning a small shop along the city's main road.  She is going to use her loan to buy a few bags of sugar and some Omo soap.  She started her activity thanks to a loan that she requested.  She would like to buy a plot of land, build a house, feed her children and continue to send them to school.  In the end, she is thankful to Hekima for the support they provide to entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy several bags of sugar and some Omo soap.

loans.name: Reyna De Los Angeles Iii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS CHASKAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lucila ella es soltera y tiene 46 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra hortalizas como zanahorias,cebollas y papas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "LAS CHASKAS" which is located in the district of Santa Ana in the province of La Convención, department of Cusco.

One of the members, Lucila, is 46 and has four children.  She works in agriculture and owns land where she grows carrots, onions and potatoes.  Her work schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and she has been in the trade for several years with very good results.

Her dream is to expand her farm business.  She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.  

The individual photo attached to the group picture is of one of the members who could not be present for work reasons.  The other members work in animal sales, clothing sales, a grocery store and food sales.

The member is grateful to everyone taking part in her dream through this loan and she is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 40 pairs of shoes.

loans.name: Marisol Yamileth

texts.es:
Marisol, de 26 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de ir a la escuela, porque el nivel de pobreza era muy alto y tenía que trabajar junto a su padre en la agricultura para poder tener la alimentación familiar; está acompañada, tiene dos hijas y las dos estudian. 

Marisol, siempre se ha dedicado a la crianza de animales y al trabajo en la agricultura; ella sale a trabajar con su pareja al corral, al cañal o a la milpa, porque su pareja trabaja desde hace 11 años en una hacienda; ellos después se dedican a cultivar para alimentación de su familia.

Marisol, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono, fertilizantes y pesticidas para el cuidado de las plagas del frijol y del maíz.

El sueño de Marisol, es tener crianza de bovinos, porque por el momento solo tienen aves de corral y cerdos.
texts.en:
Marisol, 26, was unable to get an education because of her extreme poverty level.  She had to work with her father in agriculture to feed the family.  She has a partner and two daughters who attend school.

Marisol always has raised animals and worked in agriculture.  She and her partner both work in the farming activity.  Her partner has 11 years' experience working on a farm.  They also grow food for the family.

Marisol is in need of a loan to buy manure, fertilizers and pesticides to protect her bean and corn crops.

Her dream is to raise cattle because now she only has poultry and pigs.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers and pesticides to protect her bean and corn crops.

loans.name: El Surcador Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal EL SURCADOR, él banco está ubicado en la comunidad de Pancarhuaylla distrito de Anta, provincia de Anta  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Claudia tiene 58 años de edad tiene 06 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus  actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de agricultura, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día as su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma segur apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de abono, semillas entre otros.
Los socios de sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a  cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Al momento de tomar la foto una de las socias tapo parte de la cara de su compañera con su sombrero.
Las personas que salen con la cara tapada no pertenecen al banco comunal.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank EL SURCADOR which is located in the community of Pancarhuaylla in the district and province of Anta in the department of Cusco.

Claudia, 58, has six children and a partner.  She alternates her daily activities with her agriculture business.  She is a responsible, enterprising person who has been in business for quite some time.  Things are going well for her because of the hard work she does every day.  She hopes to continue working so she can support her family.

The loan will be used to buy manure, seeds and other supplies.

The group members are grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

The face of one of the members is partially covered by another member's hat.  The people whose faces have been covered do not belong to the communal bank.

loans.use: To buy manure, seeds and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONEII, el socio continua  trabajando como operador de maquinas, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso,  el socio se siente agradecido por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas,él socio  lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo el cual le trae satisfacciones personales entre otros, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de vivieres para su hogar como arroz, azúcar,leche entre otros gastos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank COMUZONEII. He works as a machine operator and is a responsable and hardworking person. He is grateful for the loan and promises to fulfill his established quotas. He has had his job for a while which brings him personal satisfaction, especially since it's how he helps his family get ahead.

He is asking for this loan so he can buy groceries for his home such as rice, sugar, milk as well as other expenses.

loans.use: to buy groceries for his home such as rice, sugar, milk as well as other expenses.

loans.name: Cruz Francisca

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito Virgen  Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Cruz, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres mayores y uno de 7  años que estudia en escuela, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo trabaja en el muelle local.
Doña Cruz es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y así generar sus propios ingresos que le ayuden a salir adelante junto a su familia, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de víveres, pollo, carnes, granos, embutidos, legumbres, confitería, artículos de bazar, helados, aguas y muchos otros productos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes que a diario acuden a su local, sus hijos le ayudan cuando están desocupados, aunque siempre es ella que está en su local, lleva más de 20 años con este negocio el cual es parte de su vida.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda va a comprar más variedad de víveres. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella cada vez aumenta su negocio. Sus sueños es darles lo mejora  su familia.
texts.en:
The "Grupo de Crédito Virgen del Mar" [Virgen Del Mar Credit Group] meets every 15 days in the beautiful seaside resort of San Mateo in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches that are well-frecuented at any time of year by domestic and foreign tourists. In this place, most of the inhabitants make a living in fishing and in seafaring work.

In this place lives Cruz. She is 50 years old. She is married and from this relationship, they have four children: three adults and a 7-year-old student who studies in school; two of them still live at home. Her husband works at the local pier.

Cruz is a woman who likes to stand on her own and thus generate her own income to help her get ahead with her family. She has a small grocery store in her home. There, she sells all kinds of food, chicken, meat, grains, cold cuts, vegetables, sweets, bazaar items, ice cream, water, and many other products to meet the needs of her customers who daily come to her workplace. Her children help her when they are not busy, although it is always her who is in her workplace She has been more than 20 years with this business which is part of her life.

She will use this loan to stock her store more; she will buy a greater variety of food provisions. She has been in the Grupo de Crédito from the start and likes it because with the loans, she increases her business each time. Her dream is to give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy food provisions.

loans.name: Negda Araceli

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito Virgen  Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Negda, tiene 52 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres  hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. El marido tiene un carro y realiza transporte de personal. 
Doña Negda es una mujer que le gusta sentirse activa y generar sus propios recursos, ella hace 7 años con lo que tenia  surtió en su casa una pequeña tienda de víveres, allí vende todo tipo de víveres, colas, legumbres, aguas y ciertos útiles escolares, con cada crédito ella va comprando más variedad de productos ya que así ella cada vez mas gana más clientes, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos y su marido le ayuda en su negocio cuando ellos pueden, pero por lo general es ella la que siempre pasa en su local. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar más variedad de víveres y surtir aun más su negocio. Lleva 1 año en el Grupo De Crédito  y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su tienda.
texts.en:
The Credit Group Virgen Del Mar (Virgin of the Sea) meets every 15 days in the beautiful resort town of San Mateo in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches which are busy in every season of the year with domestic and foreign tourists, in this place the majority of the inhabitants make a living by fishing and water-related jobs.

Señora Negda is 52 years old and she has a domestic partnership from which she has three adult sons, two of whom still live in her house. Her husband has a car and provides personal transportation.

Doña Negda is a woman who likes to feel active and to generate her own resources. It has been 7 years since she stocked her house with a small convenience store, where she sells all types of provisions, sodas, vegetables, waters, and certain school supplies. With each loan she continues to buy more variety of products and in this way each time she gets more clients. She works every day from 6:00 AM until 8:00 PM and sometimes later. Her sons and her husband help her in her business when they can, but generally it is she who always spends time in her store.

She will use this loan to buy more variety of supplies and to stock her business even more. She has been in the Credit Group for one year and she likes it because the loans are quick and they help her a lot. Her dreams are to continue improving he store.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: María Estrella

texts.es:
El Grupo de Crédito Virgen  Del Mar se reúne cada 15 días en el hermoso balneario de San Mateo en la ciudad de  Manta, conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, en  este lugar la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a la pesca y a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Maria, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 13, 9 y 7 años de edad, todos estudian en colegio y  escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
Doña María es una mujer que no le gusta ayudarle a su marido a sobrellevar la dura carga del hogar, ella  realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en sus actividades, el se dedica a la pesca en ciertos días pero también él se dedica a la compra y venta de chanchos, el  compra los chanchos en ciudades cercanas, luego los lleva a varios mercados y los entrega a comerciantes que son los encargados de faenarlos y vender la carne, con esta actividad el logra ganarse algo lo cual le deja lo necesario para sacar adelante a su familia. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar chanchos y materiales de pesca. Lleva 4 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta la ayuda de los créditos. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The Virgen Del Mar credit group meets every two weeks in the beautiful seaside town of San Mateo in the city of Manta. It is known for its beautiful beaches, which are much visited all year around by national and foreign tourists. Most of the residents work in fishing and other ocean activities.

This is where Maria lives. She is 34 years old. She is married and has three children, aged 13, 9 and 7. All of them are in high school and elementary school. Her husband is a fisherman.

María is a woman who likes to help her husband with carrying difficult burden of the home. She is taking out the loan so that her husband can use it in his activities. He works as a fisherman some days and he also buys pigs in nearby towns and later takes them to different markets and delivers them to merchants in charge of butchering them and selling the meat. With this activity, he is able to earn something, which brings in enough to get the family ahead.

She is going to use this loan to buy pigs and fishing materials. She has been in the credit group for 4 years and she likes the help of the loans. Her dream is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to buy pigs and fishing materials.

loans.name: Cuarentitres Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por 3 mujeres, todas son de la etnia miskita de la ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres emprendedoras que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios; se organizaron como grupo solidario desde hace 12 meses para gestionar préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana.

Maila: Es integrante del grupo solidario, es una señora alegre de 34 años de edad, casada con 3 hijos adolescentes que estudian su primaria. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos y contribuir con los gastos del hogar y educación de sus hijos, vende frijoles cocidos, bastimentos y tiene una pequeña pulpería en uno de los mercados del municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar granos básicos, chiverías, entre otros productos. Ella sueña con diversificar sus productos, vender cosméticos y nacatamales.
texts.en:
This support group is made up of three woman, all of whom are of the Miskito ethnicity from the city of Bilwi, in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. They are entrepreneurial women who fight day after day to grow their small businesses; they organized as a support group 12 years ago in order to manage loans with the guarantee of support in Pana Pana.

Mala is a member of the support group, she is a happy 34-year-old woman, married with 3 teenage children who are in primary school. With the purpose of having her own source of income and contributing to the expenses of the household and the education of her sons, she sells cooked beans, supplies, and has a small grocery store in one of the markets of the town of Puerto Cabezas.

She is asking for financing to buy basic grains, dairy products, among other things. She dreams of diversifying her products, to sell cosmetics and nacatamales (maize, meat, and rice wrapped in a banana leaf).

loans.use: to buy basic grains, dairy products, among other things.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio Walter se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte, el socio es una persona trabajadora que por medio de este negocio el socio quiere sacar adelante a su familia. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar llantas y faros para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The partner Walter continues working in his transportation business, he is a hardworking person who wants to get his family ahead by means of this business. The partner is asking for the loan to buy tires and headlights for his car. The partner is happy for the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy tires and headlights for his car.

loans.name: Jose Nohe

texts.es: Jose, reside en una aldea del municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Barbara, el tiene 50 años de edad, está soltero y vive con su hijo por los momentos. Don Jose siempre ha sido agricultor. Hace 5 años que cuenta con una propiedad aparte  que  ha utilizado para dedicarse a la agricultura y cosecha de café, el cual cuenta con una gran demanda en su localidad. Solicita un prestamo de 5,000.00 Lempiras para poder darle mantenimiento a su finca lo cual implica limpieza y riego y para compra de fertilizantes, lo que le ayudara a darle mayor fuerza a sus plantaciones para una mayor producción. Con lo cual planea salir adelante, aumentar su producción e ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Jose lives in a village in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Barbara. He is 50 years old. He is single and lives with his son at this time.  Jose has always been a farmer. He has had his own property for 5 years, which he has used for farming and growing coffee, which has a high demand in his locality. He is asking for a loan of 5,000.00 Lempiras to do maintenance on his farm, which means clearing and irrigating and buying fertilizer. This will help him fortify his crops for a bigger yield. With this, he plans on getting ahead, increasing production and income and improving his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, and do clearing and irrigation for his coffee farm.

loans.name: Jeanpier Audo

texts.es:
Jeanpier con 20 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive junto a sus padres, en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia e Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Jeanpier se dedica a la venta de cerveza y gaseosa en local familiar, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 08 meses. Solicita préstamo para la compra de mercadería(cerveza) para su negocio.El crédito a otorgarle le facilitará obtener un ingreso mayor.

Jeampier si cuenta con experiencia crediticia. Es socio nuevo en nuestra institución.
texts.en:
Jeanpier is 20 years old, single, lives with his parents in the district of Cayaltí, in the province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque, in the country of Peru. The inhabitants of this locality make a living mostly in agriculture, business, and livestock.

Jeanpier makes a living selling beer and soda in a family store, which was started 8 months ago. He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise (beer) for his business. The loan will allow him to obtain better income.

Jeanpier has credit experience. He is a new partner in our institution.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (beer) for his business.

loans.name: Abelardo

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de mecanica,el socio es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a su familia.El socio solicita el crédito para comprar herramientas como espejos,faros y llantas para arreglar los carros.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The partner makes a living as a mechanic. The partner is a hardworking and entrepreneurial person who supports his family with this business. The partner is requesting a loan to buy tools such as mirrors, headlights, and tires to fix cars. The partner is happy for the loan and promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to buy tools such as mirrors, headlights, and tires to fix cars.

loans.name: El Buen Samaritano Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “EL BUEN SAMARITANO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Asencia ,la socia tiene 54 años de edad es viudad y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de venta de comida, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos como carnes, arroz, aceite entre otros.
Los socios en general agradecen el crédito y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
La socia que sale en la foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de salud.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong to the “EL BUEN SAMARITANO” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Urubamba, belonging to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cuzco.

This borrower is Asencia. She is 54 years old and she is a widow with one child. She alternates her personal activities with the food selling business. She has had this business for years and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into it every day. She wants to be able to keep working so she can continue working so she can continue supporting her family.

She is asking for the loan to buy ingredients such as meats, rice, oil and more.

The borrowers in general are thankful for the loan and committed to making their payments on time.

The borrower who appears in the attached photo had to be absent because she was late to the meeting for health reasons.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meats, rice, oil and more.

loans.name: Emma Judith

texts.es: Emma es una emprendedora mujer que inició su negocio en el año 2013 y aunque su proyecto de negocio era mucho más ambicioso, demostró que con su escaso capital pudó iniciar con una actividad de menor presupuesto y generar beneficios a su familia, de este modo ella comercializa una variada gama de productos de aseo, helados, bolis y cubetas de hielo a sus vecinos residenciados en un barrio de Cartagena de Indias. Ella vive en compañía de sus dos hijos menores de edad y su cónyuge,  su meta es ser propietaria de una tienda de víveres puesto que su familia y la de su esposo han sido tenderos por tradición, es por ello que en la actualidad Emma solicitó su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar todos los productos que ofrece al por mayor, de este modo su negocio será más rentable y cada día se acercará mas a su sueño de prosperidad.
texts.en: Emma is an enterprising woman who started her business in 2013. Although her business project was much more ambitious, she demonstrated that with her small amount of capital she could start off with a low budget activity and generate benefits for her family. She sells a wide range of cleaning products, icecreams, pens, and ice trays to her neighbours who live in a suburb of Cartagena de Indias. She lives with her two young children and her partner. Her goal is to own a general store, given that her family and her husband's family have traditionally been shopkeepers. For this reason Emma is currently requesting a Kiva loan through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo in order to buy all of the products that she sells in bulk, and in this way her business will be more profitable and every day she will be closer to her dreams of prosperity.

loans.use: to purchase the products she sells wholesale

loans.name: Leidy Esmeralda

texts.es:
Leydi, estudio hasta octavo grado, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, los más grandes ya asisten a la escuela y vive cerca de la casa de su madre. 

Leydi, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, ella logró colocar su pequeña tienda con un préstamo que se le otorgo anteriormente y poco a poco logró aumentar el inventario; ella viaja a la ciudad a comprar productos para la tienda en un pickup que posee.

Leydi, necesita el préstamo para surtir más la tienda con productos como pastas dentales, cepillos de diente, pan, café, detergentes, papel higiénico, entre otros. 

A futuro sueña con ver a sus hijos graduados de una carrera universitaria , para que tengan mayores oportunidades en el futuro.
texts.en:
Leydi studied up to eighth grade. She is a single mother with 3 children. The oldest ones go to school. She lives close to her mother's house.

Leydi has a small store in her home. She managed to set up the small shop with a loan that was granted to her previously and little by little she has increased her inventory. She travels to the city to purchase products for the shop in a pick up that she owns. Leydi needs the loan to stock her store with products such as toothpaste, toothbrushes, bread, coffee, detergents and toilet paper.

For the future she dreams of seeing her children graduate from university so that they will have better opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to stock her store with products such as toothpaste, toothbrushes, bread, coffee, detergents and toilet paper.

loans.name: Olga Evelyn

texts.es:
Olga, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja como jornalero y en la agricultura, ella se dedica al comercio de ropa ambulante desde hace cinco años, su hermana empezó ayudandole porque ella tenia un poco más de experiencia en este negocio.

Olga, antes se dedicaba a la elaboración y venta de tamales, ahora se dedica a vender ropa por todas las comunidades cercanas; mientras sus hijos le ayudan a su pareja a trabajar en la agricultura, para sembrar granos básicos para el consumo familiar.

Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar ropa, para continuar con el negocio, porque el inventario a bajado porque ella aporta un poco de efectivo para los gastos de agricultura.

Los sueños de Olga, son darle a sus hijos una vida mejor con buenas oportunidades de estudio para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Olga went to school through the third grade. She is in a relationship, and her partner works in farming and as a day laborer. She has been working for five years as a traveling salesperson of clothing. Her sister, who has more experience in this business, helped her get started.

Before she began this work, Olga made and sold tamales. Now she sells clothing in all the nearby communities while her children help her partner in the field, planting basic grains for family consumption.

She needs this loan to buy clothing so that she can continue her business. Currently her inventory is low and she has contributed some of her money to pay for farming expenses.

Olga's dream is to give her children a better life with good educational opportunities so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.pt:
O cliente Alfredo, professor de 51 anos de idade, casado, pai de 07 filhos dos quais 02  frequentam o ensino primário ,01 o ensino secundário e os outros já estão a trabalhar e independentes, vive  na casa própria e não sustenta a mais ninguém.
Com o valor o empréstimo ira comprar cimento, areia, pedra, areia branca, blocos, Tijoleira e cimento cola  para concluir a sua casa e começar a construção de dependências.
O cliente tem como sonho ter casas de aluguer e comprar um carro .
Tem como principais desafios financeiros e tem estado a trabalhar para o efeit, pretende tomar mais vezes para alcançar os seus sonhos.
texts.en:
Alfredo is a 51 year old teacher who is married and the father of seven children of whom two go to primary school, one goes to secondary school and the others are already working and independent. He lives in his own home and doesn't support anyone else.

With the money from this loan Alfredo will buy cement, sand, stones, white sand, cement blocks, tiles and cement adhesive to finish building his house and start building for his children.

His dream is to have houses to rent out and to buy a car.

His biggest challenge is his financial situation and he has been working to remedy this. He hopes to take out more loans so he can make his dreams reality.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stones, white sand, cement blocks, tiles and cement adhesive to finish building his house and start building for his children.

loans.name: Famille Kashisha Group

texts.fr: La nécessité d'un crédit se présente à Raymond afin de lui faciliter le sarclage, le paillage et la récolte de son café car il aura à engager une main d'œuvre pour le faire. Lors du crédit précédent, il a exécuté à temps l'entretien. A force d'y travailler, il observe qu'il y a une lueur d'augmentation de sa production prochainement. Comme obstacles, le prix du café a baissé; il a perdu de l'argent en cours de route en allant rembourser une tranche de son crédit. Malgré cela, il reconnaît avoir nourri et scolariser ses enfants grâce à cette activité.
texts.en:
Raymond is needing a loan to facilitate weeding, mulching and harvesting of coffee as he will have to hire labor to do this. In his previous loan, he was able to service it on time.
By dint of working on his crop, he noticed a glimmer of increase in upcoming production. In terms of obstacles, the price of coffee has fallen; he lost money during a journey to repay a portion of his loan. Despite this, he acknowledges having fed and sent his children to school through this activity.

loans.use: to cultivate and harvest coffee.

loans.name: Alda

texts.pt:
A cliente Alda  comerciante de 31 anos de idade, casada e mãe de 03 filhos, dos quais 01 a frequentar o ensino secundário, 01 no ensino primário e 01 ainda menor de idade. Vive  na casa própria e sustenta  mais um primo.
Com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar cimento, areia, pedra, arames, barrotes, janelas para remodelar a sua casa.
O cliente tem como sonho  ampliar a sua casa, construir uma outra casa para os seus filhos bem como ver seus filhos realizados na vida .
Tem como principais desafios financeiros e tem estado a trabalhar, pretende tomar mais vezes para alcançar os seus sonhos.
texts.en:
Alda is a businesswoman of 31 years of age. She is married and the mother of three children of whom one goes to secondary school, one goes to primary school and one is still too young to go to school. She lives in her own home and supports a cousin.

With the money from this loan Alda will buy cement, sand, stones, wire, beams and windows to renovate her house.

This client's dream is to extend her house, build another home for her children and to see her children live fulfilled lives.

Alda's biggest challenge is her financial situation but she has been working on this. She hopes to take out more loans so she can make her dreams reality.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, stones,  wire,  beams and windows to renovate her house.

loans.name: Kagulube Group

texts.fr: L'option crédit est favorable pour Safari car elle lui évite de vendre son café à vil prix auprès d'un acheteur ou à contracter une dette chez un commerçant mais plutôt d'attendre la récolte pour le vendre à un prix un peu plus supérieur. Les revenus produits par le crédit précédent l'ont renforcé dans l'alimentation et la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Safari favours getting a loan as this prevents him from selling his coffee at a meagre price to a buyer or from contracting debts with a trader, but rather to wait on the harvest to sell it at a somewhat higher price.
The income generated from the previous loan helped to reinforce the feeding and schooling of his children.

loans.use: to weed and mulch coffee.

loans.name: Famille Mandevu Group

texts.fr: Le crédit obtenu par Gaspard a été orienté dans l'entretien de son champ de café. Ainsi, il a payé les frais scolaires de ses enfants, nourri sa famille et renforcé son activité. Ce nouveau crédit demandé lui servira, une fois de plus, dans l'entretien de son café.
texts.en: The loan Gaspard obtained was geared towards maintaining his coffee field. Thus, he paid his children's school fees, fed his family and reinforced his activity. This new loan requested will serve, once again, for the maintenance of his coffee.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee field.

loans.name: Zuleca

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 32 anos de idade, viúva, mãe de 1 filho menor de idade, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, chapas e mais para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência.
Futuramente pretende dar continuidade com os seus estudos, terminar a sua obra de residência e garantir o ensino do seu filho até ao nível superior
texts.en:
Zuleca was born in Namaacha, a province of Maputo. She is 32 years old, widowed and the mother of one young son. She is not responsible for anyone else.

This will be Zuleca's first loan with Hluvuku, with which she plans to buy building materials such as sand, cement, zinc sheets and other items to continue building her house.

In the future Zuleca would like to continue with her studies, finish building her home and ensure her son will be educated up to high school.

loans.use: buy sand, cement, zinc sheets and other items to continue building her house.

loans.name: Vitoria

texts.en:
Vitoria built her house, but she doesn't have enough money to buy more materials so she can finish her it.

So she is requesting a loan of $ 1,000 from Tuba Rai Metin to purchase the rest of the materials.

She is taking this loan because she wants to buy the other things needed, such as sand, cement, stone, iron, zinc and other materials to use. She is very happy with the loan that offered from Tuba Rai Metin, because with this loan, she can continuing building her house.

She also has animals like pigs and chickens.

loans.use: to buy more material such as sand, cement, stone, iron, zinc and other materials to use.

loans.name: Famille Ruhinda Group

texts.fr: Il y a plus de 20 ans que Christian est caféiculteur. Il nous confie qu'il a hérité une partie de sa plantation de ses parents et il a planté l'autre partie lui-même. Avec cette activité, Christian assure la construction de sa maison et la scolarisation de ses enfants. Pour lui, l'obstacle majeur est la variation du prix du café au niveau du marché. Malgré tout cela, il ne lâche pas et espère achever son projet de construction et scolariser ses enfants. Il est accompagné sur photo par son épouse et leur jeune enfant.
texts.en:
Christian has been a coffee cultivator for over twenty years. He confided that he inherited part of his plantation from his parents and planted the other portion himself. With this activity, Christian ensures the building of his house and the schooling of his children.
For him, the major obstacle is the variability in coffee prices at the market level. In spite of all this, he does not give up and hopes to achieve his construction project and ensure his children go to school. He is accompanied on the photograph by his wife and their young child.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee field.

loans.name: Victorino

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Zavala Província de Inhambane, tem 41 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 5 filhos menores de idade, apenas 2 frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2011, este é o seu 7º empréstimo na Hluvuku com o qual pretende adquirir um jogo de sofás para sua casa.
Futuramente pretende contrair matrimónio, iniciar um negócio de criação de gado bovino e abrir um estabelecimento comercial.
texts.en:
Victorino was born in Zavala in the province of Inhambane. He is 41 years old and is in a de facto relationship. He is the father of five young chidren of whom only two go to school. He is not responsible for anyone else.

Victorino began working with Hluvuku in 2011 and this is his seventh loan with them. With it he plans to buy a lounge suite for his home.

In the future Victorino would like to get married, start a business raising cattle and open a store.

loans.use: to buy a lounge suite for his home

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a 47-year-old married woman from the City of Baybay, Leyte. Two years ago this woman started her own business to be able to help her husband with their financial stability. She owns a sari-sari store where she sells a variety of goods such as chips, candies, biscuits, canned goods, noodles, eggs, cooking oil, toiletries, laundry soap, sugar, coffee, powdered milk, powdered chocolate drink and juice. She works everyday running this business, while her husband is working in glassware.

The profits she earns from her sales aren't enough for this woman who dreams about sustainability. She wants to improve their way of living, to have enough money to provide their daily needs such as food, personal care products and a variety of beverages. She even needs money for her children’s school payment.

That's why she is requesting a loan to buy a variety of stock (mention earlier) to continue running her business.

loans.use: to buy chips, candies, biscuits, canned goods, noodles, eggs, cooking oil, toiletries, laundry soap, sugar, coffee, powdered milk, powdered chocolate drink and juice.

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is a 34-year-old woman. She is a mother of two sons, ages 14 and 16 years old. With her eagerness to help her husband, she managed to establish her own business, a small store in the ity of Baybay, Leyte. From there, she generates very good income, which is invested in her two son’s school fees and food for the household.

Juditha is asking a loan to buy stock such as canned goods, noodles, spices, toiletries, laundry soap, chips, chocolate bars and candies, biscuits, coffee, sugar and other personal care products.

Her greatest dream is to maintain their profitability and to have better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, spices, toiletries, laundry soap, chips, chocolate bars and candies, biscuits, coffee, sugar and other personal care products

loans.name: Ruvelyn

texts.en:
Ruvelyn is married and a mother of four children. For more than five years, she has been operating a general store in her village.

Ruvelyn needs to add capital in the form of inventory to increase her sales because her business is the main source of income that supports her children's needs.

Ruvelyn joined GDMPC recently and has requested a loan to buy more goods to sell in order to provide for primary consumer needs such as coffee, shampoo, noodles and canned goods.

Ruvelyn's plan for the future is to save more money to improve their living condition.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell

loans.name: Juana Amelia

texts.es:
Juana Amelia con 47 años de edad, de estado civil casada,vive en casa propia, junto a su esposo e hijos,en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque, país Perú. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.

Juana Amelia se dedica a la actividad de crianza y venta de animales menores como patos, pavos y cuyes, cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el rubro, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y alimento para la crianza de los mismos. De esta manera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Socio nuevo para nuestra Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Juana Amelia is 47 years old, married and lives in her own home together with her husband and children. She lives in the district of Zaña, a province of Chiclayo in Lambayeque, Peru. She has very good personal and work references from the locals in her community.

Juana Amelia works raising and selling small animals such as ducks, turkeys and guinea pigs. She has over five years of experience in this field working from her own home.

Juana Amelia is applying for a loan to buy animals and feed to raise them so that she can make her business grow, gain a higher income and improve her quality of life.

She is a new member of our organisation, Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed to raise them.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson lives in Maubesse and most of his daily income is from a welding workshop. He is a welder.

He is now applying for a loan of $1,500. He will use the loan from Tuba Rai Metin to buy other materials for him to do his activities, such as a motors' inner tube, oil, equipment for a motorbike and other materials to use.

He started this business in 2014 with his own working capital of $800. He is happy with the loan that offered to him because he can improve his business.

loans.use: to buy mottor's inner tube, oil, equipment for motorbike and other materials to use.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 45 years old, married and had four children. Her spouse is a tricycle driver and provides transport services to the people in their village.

Gina is now asking additional capital of P9,000 to buy gasoline and do maintenance on the motorcycle. This will help improve the services and ensure safe travel to all their passengers.

She hopes to save funds and continuously pay her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and do maintenance for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Thamarai Selvi And Group

texts.en:
Thamarai Selvi works in the agricultural fields as a daily wage labourer. She is 31 years of age and lives with her husband in the Tiruchirappalli district of Tamil Nadu. She hopes to supplement the income earned by her husband. But the income she earns from her current work is not satisfactory as the pay is inadequate and the work is seasonal in nature. She thus decided to look for a more steady source of income.

She undertook training in making kadalai urundai (peanut chikki), and is now ready to start her own business. She lacks the funds to do so. Thus she seeks a loan to start her business. Thamarai Selvi hopes to add another Rs. 1,300 to her monthly income with the start of her chikki making business.

Just like Thamarai Selvi, four other women also need a loan to start their chikki making businesses. They formed a group under the leadership of Thamarai Selvi and applied for a group loan of Rs. 100,000. These women hope to earn better with the start of their respective businesses. They hope to lead a better and more comfortable life with the increase in their income.

These women are grateful to their generous lenders.

loans.use: To start her kadalai urundai (peanut chikki) making business

loans.name: Elodi's Group

texts.en:
Elodi is a 28 year-old woman. She lives with her husband and two children. Although she is a nurse by profession and presently serving in the rural health center, she still spends her weekends at the local palm oil mill were she engages in palm kernel processing. The extra income from the palm kernel sales helps her to balance her small salary. She is very excited to have been among those to benefit from Nke-Anyi Ndu-Oma loan product.

A portion of this loan will help her purchase more bags of kernel this season and also make more income to support her husband in caring for their family.

She thanks all the Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to process and store palm oil products.
